42013028	Abraham men Ishak men Yakub men atam wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap men Allah ibam weregma yer isahupteg, 'Nir oho kila angge famen yanggal nenebehesa,' ulug heneyeg kilit matuk lit uba yatuk lamuhup.
42013029	Ap yali filon hubula filon umu filon ahamu filon wamuhupteg suburu nuk oho Allah ibam kuhup.
42013030	Ap eke fobik atuson tam amuhup, ap eke tam atuson fobik amuhup," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42013031	Welatfagma Farisi inap itanowen Yesus ambeg watfareg, "Herodesen Hat huwatmin peruk lit werehen tuma embeselug lamihin," ibag.
42013032	Ibagma Yesusen, " 'Yoho men sono men ap unundama siyag angge werehon wili feseruk lit ouk warukon hihir eneptuk lahi. We o hinahaneg angge obog aruhu,' ehek ulug olomene olokon ino hiyag irik lalihip," ibag.
42013033	"Wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap keman unusuk fug tehen o Yerusalem pumbukmuwen eneg unusukag ulug unusuruk latfag angge An oho hup hinahaneg angge ari funggalma laruk laruhuk.
42013034	Hit Yerusalem hinap fam uruk lahi. Ap wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap arimano Allahn mon enepfagma hit Yerusalem hinaben helep fam unusuruk latikip. Suwe ayam umaliki aherabul apma wol toho kilap eneptuk hag toho Anden hat humalikisi wol toho kilap enepmin perikik angge famen ninirim irikip.
42013035	Ninirim irikipmu hinibam o foluk aruhu perikikteg ari tem toho ihi. Nori, ketiya Niyahup fug, we hit henele ine roho uruk lit, 'Allah unuk fam tu waharukon Allahn fanowap timisi,' uhup sambil ari eneg An niyahup," ulug Yesusen ibag.
42014001	Welatfareg o wene uruk sambil hari Sabat Yesus Farisi inap onowe suwon ibam kibareg suburu naruk lit weregma ap arimanowen Yesusen wene uruk sambil famen tuk fug ane timisi ano ulug kilap haruk lit welatfag.
42014002	Welatfagma ap misig ebe inggiket uyuhet firuhukon eke kik watfag.
42014003	Kik watfagma Yesusen Musa wene onoluk inap men Farisi inap men unubam kapal isaruk lit, "O wene uruk sambil ap ouk warukon hihibuk teg ano, hihibuk fug teg ano?" ulug kapal isibagma enele eleg angge welatfag.
42014004	Enele eleg angge welatfagma Yesusen ap ino sen hibareg fanowap tibareg, "Lamihin," ibag.
42014005	Lamihin ibagma ap ino libagma Yesusen ap arimano unubam, "Henemloho eke henembohom eke ik senema wamburuk halug o wene uruk sambil welahep angge famen lisoho waruk lahep fug?" ulug kapal isibag ane fahet enele uk fug angge welatfag.
42014007	Yesus ap suwon ino ibam weregma umbalisi eke kik watfareg leho ambeg eneg hur amul ulug turukmu Yesusen yer isibag. Yer isibareg indit toho hiyag isaruk lit,
42014008	"Ap ekeyen seni eserik oho lit hat eke wol haptuk halug waruhunteg lehoma hur aruhun fug. Hur aruhunmu umbali suwon misig waruhumu seni ngi ahun inowen, 'Hat heriyeg lahen ambeg ari kolo rebesin, at hur arik watnisiyen,' uhumu hat hinggali hahunteg hirahoma ap enembolma hur arik lahun tohon.
42014010	Ap seni ngi ahun inowen wol haptuk halug waruhunteg hirahoma hur atmin ulug turukmen ap inowen yet hiyahureg, 'Nare, horog tiya hur arik ma,' uhumu lahunteg iraham hur aruhunmu umbalisi winon arimano iniline nare ulug hi habuhu," ulug Yesusen indit toho hiyag isaruk latfag.
42014011	Hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap san inggarehen palimuwap tarukon apma aruhu. Inggarehen apmayap tarukon palimu aruhu," ulug hiyag isibag.
42014012	Yesusen hiyag isaruk lit ap suwon wol tibahon ino fam Ele uruk lit, "Hat unukoho men hupmu men seni isag isamin ulug ap wol enebuhun halug humbalisi men hori men hotsi howesi men tung inap hat hiraham ke werehon men wol eneptuk laruhun fug. Wol enebuhunmu iren oho seni isag isahunon fahet har oho ayeg waroho isag humul ulug wol habuhup tohon.
42014013	Haren seni eseruhun halug ap enenggengge elehon men enembol simbuk tohon men unuyug siyahon men inil siyahon men wol eneptuk laruhun. It ari rohon arimanowen ayeg waroho isag hum fug teg lamuhupmu Allahn hi haptuk lit it inindimu wenggel harukon ari Allahn onolukap enebuhu sambil onggo og huruhu," ulug Yesusen hiyag itfag.
42014015	Hiyag isibahon ari ap at men suburu naruk latfahon misihen hol hibareg, "Ap Allah weregma kuhupteg suburu nahubon arimano enehiyeg toho welamuhup," ulug Yesus fam ari ibag.
42014016	Ibagma Yesusen ele indit toho hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap ekeyen seni suwon eseruhukon hit ap anggolo seni nahuben wamuhup ulug hiyag isarisi.
42014017	Hiyag isarisireg seni esetuk sambil ino amingmingangge arimano misig fam, 'Seni osoho fihiyon nalihiben maniyek ehek ulug hondog enebik lamihin,' ulug monde ferisi.
42014018	Monde feserisimu larisireg hiyag isarisimu ap arimanowen, 'Nare, nit pok amulon fahet hindimu siyag am fug,' uruk latusa. Ap misihen, 'Yabuk onggo paltikikteg yabuk nasehet tehen ha laminen pok atminon fahet hindi siyag am fug,' irisi.
42014019	Irisimu ap ekeyen te, 'Wam sapi numen ket onggo paltikikteg nasehet tehen kim isa laminen pok atminon fahet hindi siyag am fug,' irisi.
42014020	Irisimu ap ekeyen, 'Hiyap ket hilarikikteg pok atmin,' irisi.
42014021	Irisimu amingmingangge ino ikni ambeg suhuloho waharisireg iren urusa ane hiyag itisimu ap suwon ino olok harisireg amingmingangge fam uruk lit, 'Folo-folo lamihinteg ap owahalem ke werehon enenggengge elehon, enembol simbuk tohon, inil siyahon, unuyug siyahon hondog eneplug watmihin,' irisi.
42014022	Ari irisimu ap ino larisireg hondog eneplug waharisireg, 'Nikni, haren ehenon hag toho hondog enebik lahi angge nin kolo reg ambeg wereg,' il larikim
42014023	ikni inowen, 'An nibam keleg toho hur amusan lamihinteg kebunggalem ke, ke ilan ke werehon arimano hele ine roho hondog eneptug watnihin,' ulug monde ferisi.
42014024	'Ap atam wol enebihiyon pok ahasama seni eserihiyon aru tor angge oho nalusa fug, ari tem toho ihi,' irisi," ulug Yesusen indit toho hiyag isibag.
42014025	Misihim sambil Yesus kema larukmu ap anggolo mondeg angge laruk latfagma Yesusen hebeloho yer isibareg hiyag isaruk lit,
42014026	"Ap misig An men ambiyeg larukon inowen ikni isinga men uhe umalik men owesi otsi men irim teg lit wereg elehon ino inggareg fahet irim teg lit wereg elehon ino An namloho am fug teg.
42014027	Ap misihen An men lamin peruk anggeyen teltuk ahen ha rulug Nombolim laruk elehon ino An namloho am fug teg.
42014028	Hiren te o yaron eke wibuk oho lit hur amuhupteg obamangge waruk inap men o wituk inap men fahet onggo og isarukon ari winag haruk lamuhup fug?
42014029	Winag haruk lamuhup fugmu o ino olun warukmen onggo eleg laruhumu it winonen yet hisahupteg inda yag henebuhup.
42014030	Inda yatuk lit ap aru o witmin ulug olun oho fehek angge famen onggo eleg ahama lin esehek ulug hininggaliyap henebuhup," ulug Yesusen indit toho hiyag isibag.
42014031	Nin eke hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap suwon ekeyen o pumbuk eke min tog abul ulug otsi men laruk lit hur amuhupteg otsi unubam kapal isaruk lit, 'Nit ap teng numen aruwen teng likin fimahon nim ambi roho abehe ha reg,' ulug otsi kapal isahu fug?
42014032	Kapal isahumu ambi roho welahe fug ulug ot eke monde fuhumu yoho tog abul fug ulug hiyag isa lahu," ulug Yesusen indit toho hiyag isibag.
42014033	Hiyag isaruk lit, "Ihi ane ari hit fam wirim turuk lahi: Hit henenggengge foroho lahebon ari embeselug la fug teg lahepma An notsi am fug teg lahep," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42014034	"Saho fano angge famen olok eleg atuk halug saho olok turuk hag angge nungge nahup?
42014035	Saho olok elehon wen isapma kinang sei aruhu ulug kilabuk fug tehen hik isahup. Ap sa isanggo wereg halug isanggo fam holtuk laruhu," ulug Yesusen indit toho hiyag isibag.
42015001	Welatfagma pemerintah enemingmingangge uang embelug lalihip urukon men ap siyag-siyag ane turuk latfag inap men Yesusen wene hiyag nisamisi ulug Yesus ambeg luhal arik libag.
42015002	Luhal arik libagma Farisi inap men Musa wene onoluk inap men unundama onolok hibareg, "Siyag-siyag ane turuk inap nungge fahet hondog enebehekteg suburu ambiyeg naruk," uruk latfag.
42015003	Uruk latfagma Yesusen, "Wene misig indit toho hiyag hisamin," ibag.
42015004	"Ap misihen wam domba teng uhan foroho lit winag harukmen sehelimuwon misig eleg latisi. Eleg latisimu werehon arimano anggenma embeselug longgo irisiyon ino yami rurukmen weregma hiyaharisi. Ap inowen tirisiyon hag toho hiren oho turuk lahep fug?" ulug Yesusen ap arimano kapal isibag.
42015005	Kapal isibareg, "Ap inowen hiyag tihi ulug ahiyeg harisireg umaloma ha rulug ibam waharisi.
42015006	Waharisireg ori men iraham ke werehon men wol eneptisireg hiyag isaruk lit, 'Wam domba longgo ehekon hiyahakireg an nahiyeg hihi hag toho hir oho henehiyeg toho welamek,' irisi," ulug Yesusen indit toho hiyag isibag.
42015007	Hiyag isibareg, "Ap misig siyag-siyag ane turuk angge famen embeselug Allah fam wenggel haruk halug wam domba hiyaharisi ahun inowen ahiyeg harisi hag toho Allah otsi poholmonen oho enehiyeg hahup, it enebe teng uhan (sembilan puluh sembilan) fano ane eneg turukon fahet enehiyeg hahup fug," ulug hiyag isibag.
42015008	Nin eke indit toho hiyag isaruk lit, "Hiyap ekeyen uang anggen numen foroho lit winag harukmen sehelimuwon misig longgo uhumu iral hunduruhureg o imbilabi ele ke ololo piyat haruk lit fuki roho yami ruhu fug?
42015009	Yami ruruk lit hiyag tahureg ehebi winon iraham ke werehon men wol enebuhureg hiyag isaruk lit, 'An nuang longgo ehekon hiyag tihireg nahiyeg hihi hag toho hir oho henehiyeg toho welamek,' uhu," ibag.
42015010	"Ap misig siyag-siyag ane turuk angge famen embeselug Allah fam wenggel haruk halug uang hiyag tarisi hiyap inowen ahiyeg harisi hag toho Allah otsi poholmonen oho enehiyeg hahup," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42015011	Yesusen hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap misig umalikisi piren welatusa.
42015012	Welatusama amloho fobikon inowen ikni fam, 'Nikni, haren angge aruma anden tohon minggiroho og nimin,' irisi. Irisimu ikni inowen amloho atamon fam, 'Haren tohon tu,' ulug fobikon fam, 'Haren tohon tu,' ulug aren angge minggiroho og isarisi.
42015013	Og isarisireg weregman amloho fobikon ino aren angge arimano fam uang ayeg waroho hilarisireg ikni owe embeselug o yatma larisi. Yatma larisireg o yabuk wibuk fug angge aren angge eneg naruk lit we ambingga roho hiyap min inda yako weregman aren angge obog toho eleg atisi.
42015014	Aren angge obog toho eleg atisimu weregman o ino suburu obok laharisimu malik ino suburu obok toho welatisi.
42015015	Malik ino suburu oboken suburu og nutuk laruhu ulug o pumbuk ino fam ap suwon eke wereg ambeg larisimu ap inowen, 'Nambohom anggenma foroho laruhun,' ulug mingming tirisi.
42015016	Mingming tirisimu malik inowen wam foroho lit, 'Suburu oboken wamangge aruma eke namin,' irisimu hun inowen, 'A, aru wamangge foroho lahi,' ulug og itisi fug.
42015017	Og itisi fugmu malik inowen undaman wenggel haruk lit, 'Anden siyag ane tirikik,' perisi. 'An nikni amingmingangge anggolo werehon arimano nikniyen suburu og isarukmu an tuma suburu oboken war aruhuk,' perisi.
42015018	'An nikni ambeg lahukteg: Nikni, anden hat hubam oho Allah poholmon Ubam oho siyag ane tirikik uhuk,' perisi.
42015019	'Namloho ulug nubam uhun fug, hamingmingangge roho welaruhuk uhuk,' perisi.
42015020	Ari perisireg ibam ikni ambeg larisi. Yatman waharukmu ikniyen yet harisireg namloho nindiyen ulug olohotma larisireg amloho mako pug toho hi ririsi.
42015021	Hi ririkim amlohowen, 'Nikni, anden hat hubam oho Allah poholmon Ubam oho siyag ane tirikik. Namloho ulug nubam uruk laruhun fug,' irisi.
42015022	Ari irisimu ikniyen amingmingangge unubam, 'Folo-folo sum keron fanowon wak lalihipteg wan tebelihip, sohomangge inggikmu kila feselihip, sepatu uyugmu wan tebelihip.
42015023	Wan tebelihipteg wam sapi umalik fano roho endetuk lahebon ino eserik lalihipmu naruk lit nenehiyeg toho welamul,' irisi.
42015024	'An namloho tu war atisi angge oluk aha. Longgo irisi angge inam aha,' irisi. Irisimu amingmingangge arimanowen inikniyen irisi ane roho esetusama naruk lit enehiyeg toho welatusa.
42015025	Enehiyeg toho weregma amloho tamon ino yabukmuwen waharuk lit hol harukmen olma yunggultuk latusa.
42015026	Yunggultukmu hol harisireg malik inowen amingmingangge misig wol tirisireg, 'Nungge fahet yunggultuk?' ulug kapal harisi.
42015027	Kapal harisimu amingmingangge wol tirisiyon inowen, 'Hat hot longgo irisiyon ino wahama hinikniyen fano waha ulug wam sapi umalik fano roho endetuk lahebon ino eseriyek ehekma eserehesareg naruk lit enehiyehen yunggultuk,' ulug hiyag itisi.
42015028	Hiyag itisimu owe ino ahum ke het harisireg kimin fug perisimu ikni wilip atisireg, 'Namloho, kik ma,' irisi.
42015029	Kik ma irisimu amloho tamon inowen te, 'Nikni, haren nubam uruk ane holoho umbusuk fug angge hiyabuk wit hutuk lit weregman mo ilig am wirig am turuk latisi angge famen wam kambing misig hori men isag talihip ulug og nitikin fug,' irisi.
42015030	'Hat hamloho aru humbahalug laruk lit haren angge hilalug hiyap siyahon men elehap tik larisi angge famen nin wahama hindi hehenteg wam sapi fano roho endetuk laheyon isag erehen,' irisi.
42015031	Irisimu ikniyen, 'Namloho, hat likiya hupmu an men wereg lit anden tohon oho hat ngi reg lahen.
42015032	Hot aru war atisi angge oluk aha, longgo irisi angge inam ahama an oho nahiyeg hihi hag toho har oho hahiyeg himin,' irisi," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42016001	Yesusen otsi wene hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap suwon tung ahun misig men amingmingangge aren angge foroho latisiyon misig men welatusa. Welatusama ap ekeyen ap suwon ino fam, 'Hat hamingmingangge inowen haren angge arimano saplangge hik-hak isaruk,' ulug hiyag itisi.
42016002	Hiyag itisiyon hol harisireg amingmingangge ino wol tirisireg, 'Haren nanggintikinmu an holtikik? Suwesingga uang winaharuk lit hahatuk lahenon arimano kim haminen obog toho tiya imbik ma. Kim haminteg anden angge hat foroho laruhun fuhen mondabi heriye hubaharuk lahi,' ari ulug ele olok toho hiyag itisi.
42016003	Hiyag itisimu ap inowen inggareg fahet wenggel haruk lit, 'Nikniyen heriye nubahakumu nanggintuk laruhuk? Yabuk wit ta fug teg lahi, ap unubam heng eneptuk ane ninggali reg lahi,' perisi.
42016004	'Nikniyen heriye nubahakumu ap winonen nit nim welamuhuk nubam ukag ulug turuk latmin ane wenggel haruk lahi,' perisi.
42016005	Perisireg ap suwonen og isaruson paleg angge reg latuson arimano misig-misig wol eneptusareg te ap atam waharisiyon ino fam, 'Nikniyen angge nunggeyen paleg lahen?' ulug kapal harisi.
42016006	Kapal harisimu, 'Wam sei ahaluwe kubag teng uhan paleg lahi,' irisimu, 'Paleg lahen angge fahet suwesingga haharoho foroho lahiyon tu wereg. Hur atmihinteg folo-folo kim haruk lit kubag teng uhan ware fesemihinteg kubag teng piren haharin,' ulug hiyag itisi.
42016007	Hiyag itisiyon ino larisimu pirenehon ino waharisimu ubam kapal haruk lit, 'Nikniyen angge nunggeyen paleg lahen?' irisimu, ' Nasi anggen sum teng uhan paleg lahi,' irisimu, 'Paleg lahen angge fahet suwesingga haharoho foroho lahiyon tu wereg. Sum teng uhan ware fesemihinteg sum teng hinahan haharin,' ulug hiyag itisi."
42016008	Ari hiyag itisi ulug Yesusen otsi hiyag isibareg nin ele uruk lit, "Ap suwon amingmingangge inowen ikni angge hondo ribisibag angge famen fobik welaruhuk ambeg nangginoho welaruhuk ulug indi anggar atisi," ulug Yesus ap ino wel turuk latfag. "Ap kinangmon inindi folo-folo anggar atuk angge famen it seleg tegma wereg inap arimano inindi folo-folo anggar atuk eleg," ulug Yesusen otsi indit toho hiyag isibag.
42016009	" Uang siyahon ari fam ayeg war isa fug tehen hunumbaliyen oho Allah men mondabi welamuhuk ukag ulug uang siyahon ari fam ap ari pali war enebuhup," ulug Yesusen indit toho hiyag isibag.
42016010	"Ap misihen tor angge famen fano roho foroho laruhu halug su angge oho fano roho foroho laruhu. Tor angge famen siyag toho foroho laruhu halug su angge oho siyag toho foroho laruhu.
42016011	Nori, uang siyahon fano roho foroho lam fug teg lahep halug anggengge fanowon nangginoho foroho lamuhup?
42016012	Ap enenggengge siyag toho foroho lahepma hiren angge san og hisa reg?" ulug Yesusen kapal isibag.
42016013	"Ap misig iknisi piren werehonen mingming turukmu enele fano holuk fug teg. Ikni misig fahet nirim peruk lit ikni eke fahet ele fano holmin peruk. Hebeloho re ikni misig fahet fano peruk lit ikni eke fahet nirim ulug ele holtuk eleg. Allah Ninikni apma welahe uruk lahep halug uang siyahon apma welam fug teg lahep," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42016014	Farisi inap uang fahet ninindi peruk latfag inap arimano Yesusen hiyag isibag ane hol hibareg ehekon ari siyag ane ehek ulug inda yako inggaliyap tibag.
42016015	Inggaliyap tibagma Yesusen hebeloho hiyag isaruk lit, "Hiren ap iniline niren pikir ane eneg turuk lahe uruk lahep angge famen Allahn hunundama peruk lahebon ari hisaruk lit wereg. Ap kinangmonen palimu wereg peruk ane fahet Allahn apma wereg peruk.
42016016	Yohanes ap ikma pilap eneptuk latisi ahun uwan wam fugmu Musa wene men atam hiyag isaruk latfag inap arimanowen ibag ane men wene ari senegman eneg Yohanes kik waharisi. Yohanes kik waharisimu ketiya Allah ap obog toho Hinikni aruhu ulug wene fanowon ino hiyag isaruk. Hiyag isarukmu ap anggolo miyaltil kik waharuk," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42016017	"Pohol men kinang men eleg am teg angge famen wene haharehon fam ilanggen tor angge werehon eleg am fug teg.
42016018	Aben uhe subon embeselug keron hilaruk halug siyag ane turuk. Hiyap ahun subonen embeserukon ap ekeyen hilaruk halug siyag ane turuk," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42016019	"Ap suwon tung ahun eke wereg lit sum fanowon eneg wan turuk lit suburu men wam men likiya hupmu naruk lit ahiyeg toho welatisi.
42016020	Ap siyahon eke anggengge eleg ahun ahap salukangge reg ahun unuk Lazarus ino
42016021	suburu anggen men ahap men ap suwon inowen embeserukon namin ulug owahalma libareg yinggig latisi. Yinggigmu mene waharusareg ebene yowil arimano milang heheg naruk latusa.
42016022	Misihim welatusareg ap siyahon ino war atisimu malaikaren hondoholug Abraham heriyeg ambeg fanoma imbik larusa. Ap suwon ino oho war atisimu kinangma sale feserusa.
42016023	Sale feserusama ap warehon wereg ambeg libareg ouk anggolo waruk ambeg wereg lit yet harukmen Lazarus ino Abraham min fanoma yatma weregma yet harisi.
42016024	Yet harisireg ele hi roho uruk lit, 'Nikni Abraham, an hindi niyimin. Lazarus ino inggik tum ikma tung halug nambilikanggenma ik ahaluwe are ribik watmisiyen monde femihin. Indok aruwen siyahap naptuken ouk anggolo roho welahi,' irisi.
42016025	Irisimu Abraham inowen, 'Namloho, hat holuk wereg lit fano roho welatikin. Lazarus oluk wereg lit siyag toho welatisi angge ketiya tuma ahiyeg toho wereg. Hat te arima siyagma welahen.
42016026	Hit honggoleg nit honggoleg fanggong yaron werehen nit filen hit fil wam fug teg. Hit filen nit fil wam fug teg,' irisi.
42016027	Irisimu ap suwon inowen, 'Nikni, an nibam notsi fuwaben werehon
42016028	ir oho siyag ane turuk lit an welahi ambeg siyagma wamuhup tohon komo enebuhuwen Lazarus monde femihin,' irisi.
42016029	Irisimu Abrahamen, 'Musa wene men Allah wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap enewene werehon ari fam onoluk aruhu,' irisi.
42016030	Irisimu, 'A, nikni Abraham, ari fam onoluk aruhu fug. Atam war atisiyon oluk atug enembeg lelepma siyag ane embeselug holtep,' irisi.
42016031	Irisimu Abraham inowen, 'Musa men Allahn ibag ane hiyag isaruk latfag inap men enele holtuk eleg halug ap atam war atisiyon oluk atug hiyag isa lahumu holuhup fug,' irisi," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42017001	Yesusen otsi komo eneptuk lit, "Ari roho tin ulug ap inindi kahaltukon ari wereg laruhu famen ap ari roho tin ulug inindi kahaltuk ahun ino inggareg indi anggin aruhu.
42017002	Ap inine elehon inindi kahal enebuhu rohon ap ino helep simbuk humon anggolopma ililoho ik ahummu hik isahupmu fano.
42017003	Hininggareg anggat toho welamok! Hare misig siyag ane turuk halug komo riyok. Nambiken tirikik ulug wenggel haruk halug eleg aha piyok.
42017004	Hareyen hat hubam o misihim sambil sabirenam olok ane turuk halug sabirenam hambeg suhuloho waharuk lit, 'Nare, hubam siyag ane tihireg mangno ul,' uruk halug nindimu eleg aha uhun," ibag.
42017005	Yesus otsiyen Onowe fam heng turuk lit, "Nonowe, ninindi Allah fam wenggel harukon ninineyap nenebin," ibag.
42017006	Ibagma Yesusen, "Hinindi Allah tem peruk lit wene soluk anggen hahon hunundaman tot welalep halug hiren, 'E ara ahen umanggener angge heneko ik ahummu yag arik lag,' elepma yag arik lelep," ulug Ele indit toho hiyag isibag.
42017007	"Hit aruma welahebon sehelimu misig amingmingangge werehon eke wereg. Amingmingangge ino yabuk wituk angge wam foroho angge ibam waharuk halug, 'Suburu hat tam na ma!' ulug hiyag utuk lahep?
42017008	Ari hag toho turuk lahep fug. 'Suburu an fahet esetmihinteg osoho felug sum fanowon wan toho hondog nabik watnihinmu namin. Suburu men ik men an tam naminmu hat fobik namihin,' uruk lahep," ibag.
42017009	"Amingmingangge inowen at let turuk ane fahet namloho ulug hi ruruk eleg, we tuk ane tehek peruk.
42017010	Amingmingangge ari hag toho hit An notsi welahep. Allahn ari turuk lamuhup ulug hiyag hisahuwon ino obog toho tebuhupteg amingmingangge siyahon eneg welahe uhup. Niren turukuk ane ari Allahn telep peruk ane turukuk uhup," ulug Otsi hiyag isibag.
42017011	Yesusen Yerusalem lamin ulug Galilea embeselug Samaria keyen laruk latfag.
42017012	Laruk latfareg o pumbuk eke larukmen ap numen enehap salukangge reg inap luhaloho wereg lit yatman Yesus yet hibag.
42017013	Yatman Yesus yet hibareg enele hi roho uruk lit, "Yesus Nonowe fanowon, Haren hindi nisimin," uruk latfag.
42017014	Uruk latfagma Yesusen it yer isibareg, " Imam inap enembeg henehap kim hisalusan lalihip," ibagma larukmen keman fano atfag.
42017015	Fano atfagma at numon ino ahap fanowon kim hibareg, "Yesusen ari ehekma fano ahi," pibareg suhuloho watfareg ele humon fam Allah wel til waharuk latfareg
42017016	Yesus alukema hur atfareg, "Yesus Nowe," uruk latfag. Yesus Nowe uruk latfag ahun ino Samaria ahun welatfag.
42017017	Samaria ahun welatfagma Yesusen, "Hit numen fano ahasa pihi angge famen we hat numon eneg wahen? Sohowen kema wereg?" ulug kapal hibareg,
42017018	"We amu ahun aru eneg suhuloho wahareg Allah wel turuk?" ibag.
42017019	Ari ibareg, "In atug lamihin, An nubam wenggel hehenteg wahenon ariyen fano ahen," ibag.
42017020	Ap Farisi inap welatfahon itanowen Yesus fam kapal haruk lit, "Allah waruhuwon nosambil waruhu," ibagma Yesus hebeloho, "Allah waruhu ehebon ino enehangge turukmu yet haruk lahep hag toho waruhu fug.
42017021	Aben te, 'Yet hemek, Allah tuma wereg, lumu wereg,' uruk lam fug teg. Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon ino hit sehelimu wereg ulug ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.
42017022	Ari ibareg Otsi unubam uruk lit, "Hit fobik welamuhupteg hup misihim At ap kinangmon atik ibahon kim hilareg welala puhup angge famen hahup fug.
42017023	Aben hit hunubam enele uruk lit, 'Yet hemek At umu wereg, tuma wereg,' uruk lamuhupmu holuhupteg yami ruk fug angge enele holoho umbusuhup.
42017024	Lebeglu pohol alem filen atog fil lebeg turuk hag toho At ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino waruhu sambil ari inam aruhumu hiren yet hahup.
42017025	Ari roho uwan inam am fugmu miyaloho hik isahupteg Ebe wabuhup.
42017026	Ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino waruhu sambil ari indam Nuh umalikisi unubam atfahon ino hikit toho aruhu.
42017027	It indam welatfahon arimano suburu nenggeg ik nenggeg turuk lit aben hiyap heleheg hiyaben ap heleheg turuk lit welatfagma Nuh kou fam kibag sambil ino ik humon yenggeltil laharuk lit it arimano waroho lin ibag.
42017028	Lot umalikisi welatfahonen oho ari hag toho turuk latfag. Iren oho suburu nenggeg ik nenggeg og eseheg onggo paloho heleheg yabuk wireheg o wireheg turuk lit welatfagma
42017029	hun Lot ino Sodom embeselug libag sambil ino indok men helebanggen men poholman o pumbuk ino fam pilabik watfagma it arimano obog toho waroho lin ibag.
42017030	Ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino inam aruhu sambil ino ap arimano ari hag toho welamuhup.
42017031	O ari tuhu sambil ino silimu o palimu heriyeg lit welaruhuwon at anggengge mun angge man angge olma werehon hilamin ulug kuhu fug. Yabukmu werehon ino nibam suhuloho lamin puhu fug.
42017032	Lot uhe inowen tibag ane wenggel homok!
42017033	An noluk welaruhuk peruk lit wereg ahun ino oluk welaruhu fug. Longgo uhuk peruk lit wereg ahun ino Allah olohotma mondabi oluk welaruhu.
42017034	Allah waruhu sambil ino hubanggo ap piren misigmu nohoruk lamuhup angge famen misig hilahureg eke umbusuhu ulug tem toho komo heneptuk lahi," ibag.
42017035	"Hiyap piren misigmu roti anggen lilibug turuk lamuhup angge famen misig hilahureg eke umbusuhu.
42017036	Ap piren yabuk wituk lamuhup angge famen misig hilahureg eke umbusuhu," ulug hiyag isibag.
42017037	Hiyag isibagma Otsiyen Yesus fam kapal haruk lit, "Keman tuhu ane fahet ehen?" ibagma Yesusen, "Sobon men pamo men enele ngu ruruk halug ari amben angge ita wereg peruk lahep," ulug hiyag isibag.
42018001	Yesusen otsi indit toho hiyag isaruk lit, "Sembahyang uruk lit saplangge uruk lahe peruk lam fug," ulug hiyag isibag.
42018002	Hiyag isaruk lit, "O pumbuk eke ap suwon unggum kong turuk latisi ahun misig wereg lit Allah fahet akol ha fug angge ap winon fahet oho akol toho welatisi fug.
42018003	O pumbuk ino fam hiyap yuwohon misig ap eke min seli roho welatisiyon inowen alem kong turuk ahun ino ambeg likiya hupmu waharuk lit, 'Alem anden tohon ino kong nitmihin,' ulug ik waharuk latisi.
42018004	Ubam ari ik waharuk latisi angge famen ap inowen hiyap ino ele holoho embeseruk latisireg fobik indimu wenggel haruk lit, 'An Allah fahet nakol toho welahi fug angge, ap winon faher oho nakol toho welahi fug angge famen
42018005	hiyap ari nele yong naptuk lit an nubam yik kilabik waruhu rohon unggum aren tohon kong itmin,' perisi," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42018006	Hiyag isibareg, "Unggum kong turuk ahun indi hareyon inowen perisi ane ari hir oho wenggel haruk lamok.
42018007	Ap Allahn mumal eneptisiyon arimanowen Ubam enele likiya hupmu urukon iren tohon unggum kong isa fug anggeyen sono ha ulug hikip tebeselug enele holoho umbusuk teg?
42018008	Allah umalikisi unubam alem wereg halug folo-folo kong isaruk laruhu ulug tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi. Ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino waharuk lit Allah fam tem peruk inap weregma ano elegma ano waruhu?" ulug Yesusen kapal isibag.
42018009	Ap winonen nit fano ulug ininggareg wel taruk latfag inaben ap winon fahet hit siyag ulug apmayap eneptuk latfagma Yesusen wene misig indit toho hiyag isibag.
42018010	"Ap piren sembahyang ul ulug sembahyang uruk ibam laruson misig Farisi ahun, misig pemerintah amingmingangge ap fam uang embelug lalihip uruk ahun welatisiyon ino men larusa.
42018011	Larusareg Farisi ahun ino pulmu unduhuk lit undaman sembahyang uruk lit, 'Allah Nikni, ap winon hag toho welahi fug. Ap unusuruk lit enenggengge hilaruk lahi fug. Ap unubam siyag ane turuk lahi fug. Ap unuhesi hilaruk lahi fug. Pemerintah amingmingangge siyag ane turuk ahun tu hag toho welahi fug.
42018012	Minggu misig fam Hat hubam sembahyang imin ulug hiyang ninggik pirenam welahi. Anden angge palu numen tebelug numon ino Hat hunuk fam emberuk lahi,' irisi.
42018013	Ari urukmu pemerintah amingmingangge ino ilanma unduhuk lit nil poholma lahap hamin fug peruk lit kunuk toho wereg lit, 'Allah Nikni, an siyag ane turuk nahun Hindi niyimin,' irisi."
42018014	Hindi niyimin irisi ulug hiyag isibareg Yesusen te, "Ap aru Allahn fanowap tirisimu ibam larisi. Farisi ahun ino fanowap tirisi fug. Inggareg palimuwap tarukon Allahn apmayap tuhu, inggareg apmayap tarukon Allahn palimuwap tuhu," ulug pikit toho hiyag isibag.
42018015	Yesusen wene hiyag isarukmen aben unumalikisi toron Yesusen hi enepmisi ulug hondog eneplug waharuk latfag. Waharukmu Yesus otsiyen yer isibareg malik toron nungge fahet hondog eneplug waharuk ulug per enepfag.
42018016	Per eneptukmen Yesusen, "Malik toron arimano An nambeg wamag tohon hiren per enebuk fug," ulug malik toron wol eneptuk lit, "Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon malik aruma hag toho werehon eneg Inikni aruhu," ibag.
42018017	"Malik toronen, 'Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon Ar oho nit Ninikni nir oho At umaliki,' urukon hag toho uruk elehon Allah weregma kuk fug teg, ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.
42018018	Yahudi inap onowe roho werehon misihen Yesus fam kapal haruk lit, "Nowe, Hat fano ane hiyag isaruk Hahun, an Allah ambeg kuhukteg mondabi noluk welaruhuken nanggin-nanggin turuk laruhuk, hiyag nimin," ibag.
42018019	Ibagma Yesusen hebeloho, "Nare, An nubam nungge fahet Hat fano Hahun ehen? We Allah misig eneg fanowon wereg," ibareg,
42018020	"Allah wene atam ibahon ari hat holuk: Hiyap pal ta fug, ap unusuk fug, yoholiyangge hila fug, ap enebug henele si uk fug, hiniknisi hinisingasi hinindi roho welamuhup ibahon ari hat holuk," ibag.
42018021	Ibagma ap inowen hebeloho, "Ehenon ari nebe kabinimu holtuk latikikon ketiya Haren ehenon oho holihi," ibag.
42018022	Ibag ane ari Yesusen hol hibareg Yesusen, "We misig eneg holuk atuk eleg: Haren angge obog toho ayeg waruhunteg ap enenggengge elehon ayeg waruhun angge arimano og isa lahunmu hat ngi aruhun angge poholma welaruhu. Poholma werehen suhuloho Nambeg waruhunmu An men ambiyeg laruk lamuhuk," ibag.
42018023	Yesusen ibag ane ap inowen hol hibareg aren angge anggolo werehen indi anggin atfag.
42018024	Indi anggin atfareg weregma Yesusen yet hibareg ap winon hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap ininggikmu uang anggolo werehon Allah ambeg kuk teg angge famen anggengge anggolo werehen kuk fug teg.
42018025	Wam sapi lisu fo reg keyen kuk hag teg halug ap enengge anggolo werehon eke Allah ambeg kuk teg," ibag.
42018026	Ibag ane ari ap arimanowen hol hibareg, "Haren ari ehenma ap sa Allah ambeg kuk teg?" ulug Yesus kapal hibagma
42018027	Yesusen, "Ap kinangmonen tuk fug tohon ari Allahn eneg tuk hag teg lit wereg," ibag.
42018028	Ari ibagma Petrusen, "Nowe, niren angge mun angge man angge embeserukukteg Hat men ambiyeg laruk lahe," ibagma
42018029	Yesusen, "Allah wene fahet ibam embeselug uhe owesi otsi embeselug ikni isinga umaliki embeselug laruk inap arimano
42018030	ketiya kinangma welahe li Allahn onggo sebe roho og isahureg fobik welamuhupmu Allah men mondabi onoluk welamuhup," ibag.
42018031	Yesusen otsi nisanggowen Niraham tiya maniyek ulug wol enepfareg Ele hiyag isaruk lit, "Nori, nit Yerusalem ilig amuhukmu wene atam hiyag isaruk latfag inap arimanowen At ap kinangmon atfahon fahet haharoho imbibahon hikit aruhu.
42018032	At ino Allah wene enepeleg inap og isahupmu Inggaliyap turuk lit Ebe watuk lit wasubag sup isaruk lit
42018033	siyahap turuk lit pinggi ware fesuhup. Ware fesuhup angge famen hup hinahaneg angge Allahn Olukap tuhu," ulug hiyag isibag.
42018034	Hiyag isibahon fahet inindi sohu reg lit nungge fahet hiyag nesehek ulug inindi anggar atfag fug.
42018035	Yesus o Yerikho lamin ulug horogma larukmen ap il hupnihon funggalma heriyeg lit ap la wam turukon fam hengangge heng eneptuk latfag.
42018036	Heng eneptuk lit weregma ap anggolo laruk lit enele urukon hol isibareg ap anggolo nungge fahet laruk ulug ap fam umung isibagma
42018037	iren te, "Yesus Nazaret ahun ino men laruk," ibag.
42018038	Ari ibagma ele hi roho uruk lit, "Yesus Daud amloho, an Hindi niyimin," uruk latfag.
42018039	Uruk latfagma ap atam laruk latfahon arimanowen hele imbisin ulug pet tibagma enele holuk fug angge sobir isaruk lit ele hi roho, "Daud amloho, Hindi niyimin," uruk latfag.
42018040	Uruk latfagma Yesus in atfareg, "Ap ari Nambeg tiya hondoholug maniyek," ibag. Ibagma ap ino Iraham watfagma Yesusen at ubam kapal haruk lit,
42018041	"Nungge ane nubam timisi ulug heng Naptuk lahen?" ibagma, "Nowe, an nil fano atnisiyen heng Haptuk lahi," ibag.
42018042	Ibagma Yesusen, "Hil fano amag! Nil fanowap napmisi ulug we tem toho pehenon ariyen fano ahen," ibag.
42018043	Yesusen ari irikim il fano atfagma Yesus men ambiyeg laruk lit Allah wel turuk latfag. Wel turukmu ap anggolo arimanowen yet hibareg iren oho Allah wel turuk latfag.
42019001	Yesus o Yerusalem lamin ulug o Yerikho keyen laruk latfag.
42019002	Larukmen ap eke unuk Zakheus pemerintah amingmingangge ap fam uang embelug lalihip uruk inap onowe aren angge anggolo werehen at tung ahun hag toho welatfag.
42019003	Zakheus inowen Yesus yet ha lamin ulug libareg at uwag horog tehen ap anggolo arimanowen mapmu rehen yet ha fug teg latfag.
42019004	Yet ha fug tehen folo-folo olohotma arik libareg Yesus ke aru waharukmu yet hamin ulug e ara fene lahibag.
42019005	Lahibareg weregma Yesus iraham libareg lahap haruk lit, "Zakheus, hat hibam ketiya lulen folo wambik ma," ibag.
42019006	Ari ibagma folo-folo wambibareg ahiyeg haruk lit Yesus hondoholug ibam libag.
42019007	Ibam kurukmu aben yet hibareg, "Ap siyag ane eneg turuk ahun ibam nungge fahet kehek," ulug enele siyag toho uruk latfag.
42019008	Uruk latfagma Zakheusen Yesus fam ele uruk lit, "Nowe, ap hiyap enenggengge elehon anden angge pul ke minggiroho og isamin," ibareg, "Aben tohon hilarikikon faher oho iren angge fahet sebe roho uhanam ayeg war isamin," ibag.
42019009	Ibagma Yesusen, "Ap aru oho Abraham amloho werehen te Allahn o aru yoho fanowap tehek," ibag.
42019010	"At ap atik ibahon ino it longgo uruson hiyag enebuhukteg fanowap enebuhuk ulug waharisi," ibag.
42019011	Yesusen hiyag isibahon ari holfag inaben Yerusalem horogma welahereg Allah wambik waruhureg nit fanowap nenebuhuwon horog toho welahe peruk latfagma Yesusen wirimangge eke hiyag isamin pibag.
42019012	"Ap suwon misig o yatma lamin perisi ambeg ino ap suwon arik lahukteg nin fobik suhuloho nibam waruhuk ulug larisi.
42019013	Lik oho lit amingmingangge numen wol enepfareg wal taneg uang suwon og isarisi. Og isaruk lit, ' Uang aru fam onggo paleheg ayeg war eseheg turuk lamuhupmu an waruhuk,' irisi.
42019014	An fobik waruhuk ulug larukmen ibam yugmu inap arimanowen at nit nonowe roho welaruhu fuhen ninirim ulug ombolim muko lalihipteg hiyag irik lalihip ulug ap mon eneptusa.
42019015	Mon eneptusama at ino larisireg ap suwon atisireg ibam suhuloho waharisireg amingmingangge uang og isarisi inap arimano wol eneptisi. Uang og isarikikon nombaren ayeg waroho warusa perisireg hiyag numusa ulug wol eneptisi.
42019016	Wol eneptisimu ap atamon ino waharisireg hiyag utuk lit, 'Nikni, haren og nitikinon ino anden ayeg waroho numen warikik,' irisi.
42019017	Irisimu ikni inowen, 'Namloho, haren turuk latikin ane fano hiyag nerehen. Tor angge famen fano roho foroho latikinmu o pumbuk numen fahet inikni ap suwon welaruhun,' irisi.
42019018	Ari irisimu ap pirenehon ino waharisireg, 'Nikni, haren og nitikinon fam fuwaben ayeg waroho warikik,' irisi.
42019019	Irisimu ikni inowen, 'Hat eke o pumbuk fuwaben inikni roho wereg laruhun,' irisi.
42019020	Irisimu amingmingangge hinahanehon ino waharisireg, 'Nikni, hat holok hahun ulug nakolen an og nitikinon ino wilikap fam het toho foroho latikik angge tu hilamihin. Emberikin fuhonet sebe roho hilaruk lahen. Yag tarikin fuhonet sebe roho yahal taruk lahen. Ari roho turuk lahen ane an noluk,' irisi.
42019022	Irisimu ikniyen, 'Namloho hat siyag, hinggarehen ehenon ari fam hebeloho pet hapnin. Emberikik fuhonet yag tarikik fuhonet nolok nahunen hilaruk lahi ane hat holuk teg lahen.
42019023	Holuk teg angge famen uang og hitikikon nungge fahet ap winon og isarikin fug? Og eselenma iren ayeg waroho og hetlepma sebe roho helele,' irisi.
42019024	Irisireg ap welatuson arimano fam, ' Uang ari taluk tilihipteg numen forohowon ino og emek,' irisimu
42019025	ap arimanowen, 'Ninikni, aren numen foroho angge re nin eke nungge fahet sebe roho og umul,' ulug kapal harusa," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42019026	Hiyag isaruk lit, "Enengge anggolo forohowon itano Allahn sebe roho og isahu, enengge elehon itano tor angge forohoman taluk toho hilahu," ulug pikit toho hiyag isibag.
42019027	Hiyag isibareg ap suwonen tuhu ane hiyag isaruk lit, "An men seli roho welatuson tuman ap suwon arik waruhu fug urusa inap arimano tuma hondog eneplug wamuhupmu an nolohotman waroho lin isahup ulug ap suwonen ari irisi," ulug hiyag isibag.
42019028	Wene ari obog toho hiyag isibareg Yesus tam atfagma Otsi men Yerusalem fil laruk latfag.
42019029	Yerusalem fil laruk latfareg Yesus o Betfage men Betania men Zaitun punumu wirihon itano horogma libareg otsi piren unubam hit tam laruk lamek ulug mon eneptuk lit,
42019030	"O pumbuk lindi lalihipteg keledai umalik ket su atukon ap ubam laharusa fuhon ililoho weregma halihibon ari loltihipteg walug watihip.
42019031	Aben nungge fahet loltuk lahep ulug umung hisaruk halug, 'Nonowe asehet tehen mon nenebehekma loltuk lahe,' ilihip," ibag.
42019032	Ibagma Yesus otsi piren mon enepfahon itano libareg Onoweyen hiyag isibahon hikit toho weregma libag.
42019033	Libareg keledai umalik ino loltukmen ngi inap arimanowen, "Nungge fahet loltuk lahep," ibagma iren te, "Nonowe asehet tehen mon nenebehekma loltuk lahe," ibag.
42019035	Ibareg keledai ino Yesus ambeg walug watfareg enesum wan tohon nonggoloho keledai palimu tuwale fibareg Yesus hamboko horiye fik lahibag.
42019036	Lahibareg larukmen ap arimanowen enesum nonggoloho Nonowe watmisi ke ulug funggalem ke tuwaltil laruk latfag.
42019037	Tuwaltil laruk lit Zaitun punumu wamburuk lit Yesus otsi men ap anggolo laruk latfahon arimanowen enehiyeg atfagma enele humon fam Allah wel turuk lit, "Mun angge man angge aben tuk fug ane nonolohotman tirisiyon yet harukuk.
42019038	Ap suwon Allah unuk fam waharukon hi ruruk lahe. Poholman palimu werehon Allahn fanowap tirisimu At wel turuk lamuhup," uruk latfag.
42019039	Ari uruk latfagma Farisi inap it sehelimu werehonen Yesus fam enele uruk lit, "Nonowe, Hotsi enele eleg amusan komo enebin," ibagma
42019040	Yesusen, "An notsi aruma enele eleg amusa halug helep aruman enele hi roho ulusa. Ari tem toho ihi," ibag.
42019041	Ari ibareg Yesus o Yerusalem horogma libareg o pumbuk yet hibareg uba yatuk lit,
42019042	"O Yerusalem nindiyen-e, hat fanowap habuhuwon ino yoho holuk toho welalen angge famen ketiya hat holohotma ari hiraho lit wereg.
42019043	Tot welaruhunmu ap seliyonen walinggoho kilap habuhupteg huwabuk oho lit kinang amuwon habuloho o Yerusalem elehet yaron ohowon ino horohap tuhupteg kuhup.
42019044	Kuhupteg hibam halog tebeseruk lit hunumalikisi unusuruk lit helep elehet ohowon ubule misig oho welaruhu fug. Allahn fanowap hapmin perisi sambil ari haren wenggel harikin fugmu ari roho huwabuhup," ibag.
42019045	Yesus o Yerusalem Allah ibam kibareg onggo paloho ayeg waroho waruk inap yanggal eneptuk lit,
42019046	"An nibam tu sembahyang uruk ibam haharoho wereg angge famen hiren siyag ane turuk inap inibamap tirikip," ibag.
42019047	Ibareg likiya hupmu Allah ibamen wene hiyag isarukmu imam onowesi suwon men Musa wene onoluk inap men Yahudi onowesi suwon men alem nungge fam umbuhukteg wabuhuk ulug enele sahaltuk latfag angge famen ap anggolo wene fanowon holtul ulug luhal arik watfagma senebuk fug teg latfag.
42020001	Misihim sambil Yesusen Allah ibamen wene fanowon hiyag isarukmu imam onowesi suwon men Musa wene onoluk inap men Yahudi inap onowesi men Ambeg libareg kapal haruk lit,
42020002	"Haren turuk lahenon ari san Hineyap haptisireg Holukap haptisimu turuk lahen, nir oho hiyag nisimin," ibag.
42020003	Ibagma Yesusen, "Anden oho hit hunubam hebeloho kapal hisamin.
42020004	Yohanesen ap ikma pilap eneptuk latisiyon ari poholman perisi ane ano, ap kinangmonen perusa ane ano ulug hiren An hiyag Nemek," ibag.
42020005	Ibagma it-it enele sahaltuk lit, "Poholman perisi ane ul halug nungge fahet at ele holtikip fug ik ohoreg.
42020006	Ap kinangmonen perusa ane ul halug ap aruman Yohanes ari Allahn monde ferisiyon tem toho peruk lit helep fam nunusuk ohoreg," uruk latfag.
42020007	Uruk latfareg Yesus fam, "Nenepeleg," ibagma
42020008	Yesusen, "Hiren nenepeleg ehepma Anden oho An nineyap naptisiyon fahet hiyag hisamin fug," ibag.
42020009	Yesusen ap anggolo weregma indit toho hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap misihen hele anggur yabuk wiri feserisireg ap winon foroho lamuhup ulug hiyag isarisireg o yatma larisireg amusun toho welatisi.
42020010	Welatisireg anggur anggen urukon li waharuk ulug anggen eke minggiroho numbahakup ulug amingmingangge monde ferisi. Monde ferisimu yabuk foroho inap enembeg larukmen ware feserusareg og humul fug ulug yanggaltusa.
42020011	Yanggaltusama nin amingmingangge eke monde ferisimu ino oho ambi roho ebe watuk lit har oho og humul fug ulug yanggaltusa.
42020012	Yanggaltusama amingmingangge hinahanehon monde ferisimu ebe ware feserusareg miyaloho hik isarusa.
42020013	Hik isarusama ngi ahun inowen nangginoho timin perisireg namloho nindiyon monde feminmu at fahet enekol hahup perisireg monde ferisi.
42020014	Monde ferisimu waharukmu yet harusareg, 'Yabuk ngi aruhuwon ino waharuken pinggi ware fusulteg yabuk nit ngi amuhuk,' ulug enele sahaltuk latusa.
42020015	Sahaltuk latusareg waroho elehet selma hik isarusareg pinggi ware feserusa. Yabuk ngi ahun ino waharuk lit yabuk foroho inap unubam nangginuhu," ulug Yesusen ele indit toho kapal isibag.
42020016	Kapal isibareg, "Ngi ahun waruhureg yabuk foroho inap waroho pinggi unusuhureg yabuk ino ap winon hiyag isahu," ibag. Ari ibagma ap arimanowen hol hibareg, "Ari roho tuk fug teg," ibagma
42020017	Yesusen yer isibareg, "Wene atamon fam haharoho imbibahon iminon tu holeg lamok, 'O wituk inaben helep tu siyag ulug hik isaruson ino ubule yag atisi.' Nungge ulug haharoho imbibag?
42020018	Ap eke helep ubule ino fam uyug kik turuk lit mako wambuhureg uyug fala roho uwag lilibug toho lin uhu. Helep inowen ap ino hondo ruhu halug ap ino lilibug toho kinang aruhu," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42020019	Hiyag isibagma Musa wene onoluk inap, imam onowesi suwon arimanowen, "Yesusen hiyag nesehekon ari nit fahet ehek," ulug enele sahaltuk lit o ino sambil Yesus ki rul ulug tibag angge famen ap anggolo enekolen imbisibag.
42020020	Musa wene onoluk inap men imam onowesi men Yesus uruk ane aluwat halihip ulug ap mon eneptuk lit, "Yesusen siyag ane uruk halug senebuhukteg pemerintah ap suwon wereg ambeg hondoholug lahuken Aren uruk ane aluwat haruk lit Yesus ele holtuk inap hag toho turuk latihip," ibag.
42020021	Ibagma libareg Yesus fam kapal haruk lit, "Nonowe, ap winon fahet Nakol puk fug angge Hele uruk lahenon Allahn peruk hag toho Hindi wirik toho hiyag isaruk lahen.
42020022	Ap suwon Kaisar inowen uang heng neneptukmu og um teg ano, og um fug teg ano?" ulug kapal hibag.
42020023	Kapal haruk lit unundaman un ane wenggeltuk lit urukon ari Yesusen oluk atfareg,
42020024	" Uang anggen misig og Nirik maniyek, kim haminen, orohole ilit tehon men unuk haharehon men ap sa hahareg lit wereg?" ulug kapal isibagma, "Kaisar orohole men unuk men hahareg lit wereg," ibag.
42020025	Ari ibagma Yesusen hebeloho Ele uruk lit, "Kaisar og um hahon Kaisar og umuhup. Allah og Um hahon Allah og Umuhup," ibag.
42020026	Yesusen ari roho hiyag isarukmu hol hibareg unggum Ubam umbul pibahon ino umbuk fug teg latfagma enekolen enele eleg angge welatfag.
42020027	Misihim Saduki inap ap war atukon Allahn onolukap enebuhu fug peruk inap Yesus ambeg watfareg,
42020028	"Nonowe, Musan nit fahet haharoho imbibahon te: Ap misig umalik indag ta fug angge uhe tuhum weregma lin isalug war atukmu areyen nowe ubalmangge malik enderuhuk ulug hiyap ino hilahu ulug haharoho imbibag ane fahet niren kapal Huyul," ibag.
42020029	"Ap misig umalikisi enebe sabiren welatusa. Onowe wandabonen hiyap hilarisireg malik endebuk fug angge war atisi.
42020030	Hiyap oweyen lin tirisiyon ino ot pirenehon inowen hilarisireg at ino oho malik endebuk fug angge war atisi.
42020031	It piren itano war atusa hag toho hiyap misihon ino ekeyen wilil ekeyen wilil turukmen it fuwaben itano oho obog toho malik endebuk fug angge war eneg atuk latusama
42020032	hiyap ino oho war atisi.
42020033	Hiyap ino it sabiren itano og enesug latisi angge Allahn ap obog toho onolukap enebuhu sambil ap sabiren itano onolukap enebuhumu hiyap ino ap san oho laruhu?" ulug kapal hibag.
42020034	Kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Ap kinangmonen aben hiyap heleheg hiyaben ap heleheg turuk.
42020035	Allahn tu Numalikisi ulug ap onolukap enebuhumu poholma kuhupteg aben hiyap heleheg hiyaben ap heleheg tuhup fug.
42020036	It arimano Allahn onolukap enebuhumu war am fug angge Allah umalikisi malaikat hag toho welamuhup.
42020037	Musan haharoho imbibahon ariyen ap warehon onoluk amuhup ane seleg teg lit wereg. Musa e folim indok ambulpul turukmu iraham libareg Allah unuk uruk lit, 'Abraham Ikni re Allah wereg, Ishak men Yakub men Inikni re Allah wereg,' ulug Allah wel tibag.
42020038	Abraham men Ishak men Yakub men ap warehon hag toho wereg eleg. Allah olohotma werehon obog toho onoluk eneg wereg," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42020039	Hiyag isibagma Musa wene onoluk inap itanowen, "Nonowe, ehenon ari fano hiyag nesehen," ibareg
42020040	enele anggin atfareg eke umung ha fug angge welatfag.
42020041	Yesusen it arimano hiyag isaruk lit, "Aben Mesias ino fahet Daud amloho urukon ari nungge fahet uruk?
42020042	Daud inggarehen Mazmur wene fam hahatuk lit, 'Nikni Allah inowen an Nikni fam Ele uruk lit Hat men seli roho welahebon arimano Huyug apma umbuhuken Ninggik pikit fil tiya hur arik ma ibag,' ulug haharoho imbibag.
42020044	Daud inggarehen Kristus Nikni ibag angge famen Mesias ino fahet Daud amloho nangginoho uk teg?" ulug Yesusen kapal isibag.
42020045	Ap anggolo luhaleg latfahon holegma Yesusen otsi hiyag isaruk lit,
42020046	"Musa wene onoluk inap enele holuk fug angge welamok. Enesum yaron wan toho laruk lit pasar waruk ambeg lulmu ap anggolowen hi nenebusa ulug laruk lit wene uruk ibam kulug lehoma hur atuk lit seni esetuk ambeg lehoma hur atuk lit turuk inap enele holuk fug.
42020047	Suburu enebit naruk hag toho hiyap yuwohon enengge inibam feleng toho hilaruk lit aben fano helehesa ukag ulug sembahyang yaron uruk angge famen Allahn unusuruk lit mondabi siyagma umbusuhu," ibag.
42021001	Yesus o sembahyang uruk ibam kibareg yer enesugmen ap suwonen uang derma fahet ulug anggolo kilaptuk ambeg emberukmu yer isibag.
42021002	Yer isaruk lit hiyap yuwon eke anggengge elehon uang anggen piren emberukmu yet hibareg
42021003	Yesusen ele uruk lit, "Hiyap yuwohon aru anggengge eleg angge famen anggolo embehek, it winon enenggengge anggolo foroho angge famen tor angge embehesa.
42021004	It arimanowen enenggengge sebe roho werehon embehesama hiyap yuwohon ari suburu onggo paloho nahuk ulug fet taluhon itano obog toho embehek," ibag.
42021005	Ap welatfahon itanowen o Allah ibam walinggoho kim haruk lit, "Helep fanowon aruma fene aliliyangge fanowon lahabe feruson men mun angge man angge Allah fahet emberuk latuson men nenekolen-e," uruk latfagma Yesusen,
42021006	"Fano angge yet hehebon aruma tot welamuhukmu obog halog toho lin uruk lit helep palimu werehon aruma misig oho welaruhu fug, obog halog toho wambuhu," ibag.
42021007	Yesusen ari ibagma ap arimanowen kapal haruk lit, "Nonowe, Haren ehenon ari nosambil aruhu ane fahet ehen? Enehangge nungge hag toho tuhumu yet hahukteg nonoluk aruhu?" ulug kapal hibag.
42021008	Kapal hibahon fahet Yesusen hebeloho hiyag isaruk lit, "Hinindi ninap heneptuk inap waharuk lit An nunuk uruk lit ekeyen an Honowe tu waharuk lahi, ekeyen waruhu sambil horog teg ulug hunubam uk nowen honoluk toho wereg lit enele holuk fug.
42021009	Tog aptuk lit pin unusuruk urukmu holuhup ane Allah indimuwen tam perukon fam turuk ulug henekol toho welamuhup fug. Siyag ane ari turuk urukmu holuhup halug pohol kinang ketiya eleg atmisiyen turuk ulug puk fug," ulug hiyag isibag.
42021010	Hiyag isibareg nin Ele uruk lit, "O pumbuk ekeyen te o pumbuk eke min tog aptuk lamuhup. Ap ekeyen te ap eke min seli roho welamuhup.
42021011	O meken ap unusuruk lit suburu oboken eneyeg hambuk il, ouken ap war atil pohol keyen tuhu ane fahet enekol anggolo haruk lamuhup.
42021012	Anden ihiyon ari uwan tuk fugmu hit Yesus wene uruk inap ulug sen henebuhupteg hele wat heneplug wene uruk ibamen ap suwon wereg ambeg hondog henebuhupteg penjara fam kilap henebuhupmu pemerintah ap suwon men unggum kong turuk inap enelukema unduhuk hunubahik lahup.
42021013	Enelukema unduhuk hunubahik lahupmu hiren ap suwon hiyag isaruk lit nit Nonowe Yesus atisiyon ino hir oho Honowe aruhu ulug fag toho hiyag usul peruk lamuhup.
42021014	Hinog og hisahupmu nungge hebeloho uhuk ulug hinindi anggin toho welamuhup fug.
42021015	Hiren ino sambil uhup ane fahet Anden hiyag hisahukmu seliyonen hunusul puhubon arimanowen hunumbahakupteg enele eleg angge welamuhup.
42021016	Hiniknisi hinisingasi honowesi honotsi honori hunumbalisi arimanowen hunusukag ulug huruwe laruk lamuhupmu hit welahebon aruma winon eke pinggi hunusuhup.
42021017	Hit fahet ap aruma Yesus umalikisi wereg ulug ap obog tohowen ninirim uruk lamuhup.
42021018	Honoruk hununggulmu wilip atukon misig oho longgo uhup fug.
42021019	Wene fanowon hininggik ine roho senetuk lamuhupmu mondabi honoluk welamuhup."
42021020	"O Yerusalem pumbuk humon ino ap seliyon onolok inap arimanowen walinggoho kilap eneptukmu yer isahupteg ketiya pin unusuk ohoreg puhup.
42021021	O Yerusalem walinggoho wereg inap punu keyen longgo uhup, pumbukmu wereg inap folo-folo wilip amuhup, ho roho laruk ambeg werehon kik wamuhup fug.
42021022	Atam haharoho imbibahon hikit toho Allahn hebeloho unusuhu.
42021023	Siyag aruhu sambil ino hiyap malik forohowon men ag mondotukon men siyahap eneptuken inindi anggin toho welamuhup. Ap arimano siyahap eneptuk lit onolok ane unubam tuhup.
42021024	Karog ayeg fam kong toho ininggik hele waroho umu fil ahamu fil hondog eneplug lahup. Wene enepeleg inaben o Yerusalem unuyuhen sobir isahupmu Allahn uhu sambil eneg umbusuhup."
42021025	"Mo suhal pikalem ilalin toho inam aruhumu laut ik humon haglabut waharuk lit aplohok kelambag tirikim hondo nenebik oho reg ulug enekol anggolo hahup.
42021026	Pohol ine werehon yuk tuhumu kinangma tuma nungge inam atmisi ulug ap enekolen yuk lagmag uhupteg war amuhup.
42021027	Allahn tuhu sambil ino At ap kinangmon atfahon ino hina apmane Ebe ine roho umbagpag toho waharukmu yet hahup.
42021028	Alem tuhuwon ino ak tuhu sambil fanowap henebuhuwon ino horogma waharuk ulug in atug hinisanggo leho lit welamuhup."
42021029	Yesusen wene eke indit toho hiyag hisamin ibareg, "E ara men e winon anggen uruk ahen men yet homok.
42021030	E alit subalik oho lit pik wirig halug owil turukon li warik ohoreg ulug honoluk atuk.
42021031	Ari fam honoluk atuk hag toho Anden ihiyon aru turukmu yet hahupteg Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhuwon ino ketiya horog teg ulug honoluk aruhu.
42021032	Ap ketiya werehon eleg am fug angge weregma Anden ihiyon aru teko lahu.
42021033	Pohol men kinang men eleg aruhu angge famen An nele uruk lahiyon ari eleg aruhu fug," ibag.
42021034	"Allah waruhu sambil ino aben pak wabuhuk ulug yebangge turukon hag toho yebangge elma kuhup tohon mun angge man angge kinangma werehon fahet wenggel ha fug angge suburu fahet henebuwap toho tuk fug angge ik olokon nalug nenek turuk inaben turuk hag toho tuk fug angge wereg lit hinindimu honoluk toho welamuhup.
42021035	Allah waruhu sambil ino ap obog toho kinangma werehon hondo enebik oho waruhu.
42021036	Siyahonen hondo heneptukmu fano wilip amuhuben At ap kinangmon atfahon ino Alukema hunumbahakuwen hinindimu honoluk teg lit sembahyang uruk lamuhup," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
42021037	Unukoho Yesusen Allah wene uruk ibamen wene hiyag isaruk lit hubanggo Zaitun punumu nohik laruk latfag.
42021038	Ari turuk lit weregma ap anggolo Allah wene uruk ibam Aren wene hiyag nisarukon holtul ulug waharuk latfag.
42022001	Yahudi inaben suburu roti sig elehon naruk sul Paskah sul ino horog teg latfagma imam onowesi suwon men Musa wene onoluk inap menen ap anggolo weregma senebuk fug tehen nangginoho Yesus senebuhukteg wabuhuk ulug enele sahaltuk latfag.
42022003	Yesus otsi nisanggowen itano misig unuk te Yudas unuk eke Iskariot ino undama siyag angge Iblis kibareg
42022004	imam onowesi men Allah wene uruk ibam foroho inap men enembeg libag. Libareg Yesus hirahoma lahumu huruwe waruhuk ulug it arimano men enele sahaltuk lit hiyag isibag.
42022005	Hiyag isibagma enehiyeg hibareg niren uang onggo og humuhuk ulug hiyag itfag.
42022006	Hiyag itfagma Yesus hirahoma lahumu huruwe lahuk ulug indimu wenggel haruk lit welatfag.
42022007	Welatfagma roti sig elehon naruk sul wam domba Paskah esetuk sul ino horog atfagma
42022008	Yesusen Petrus men Yohanes men unubam hiyag isaruk lit, "Hit lalihipteg seni Paskah nit nulen eserik lalihip," ulug mon enepfag.
42022009	Mon enepfagma iren te, "Nonowe, seni Paskah ari o keman nulen eserik lalusa peruk lahen," ulug Yesus kapal hibagma Yesusen,
42022010	"O pumbukmu kilihipteg ap misihen ik kubag fam hinanggoho walug larukmu yet halihibon ari ombolim lalihipteg at kimisi ibam ino kilihip.
42022011	Kilihipteg o ngi ahun ino fam, 'Nonoweyen o keyen Notsi men seni Paskah nul ulug mon nenebehekma wahereg umung hiyaruk lahe,' ilihipmu
42022012	ap inowen o suwon mun angge man angge wereg ibam hiyag hisamisimu o ariyen isag neneplihip," ulug Otsi hiyag isibag.
42022013	Hiyag isibagma libareg Yesusen ibag ane hikit toho o ino hiyahibareg esetuk latfag.
42022014	Hup atfagma suburu nul ulug Yesus otsi men olma kibareg hur atfag.
42022015	Heriyeg lit weregma Yesusen, "An Honowe Nuwabuk fugmu hit min seni Paskah aru ambiyeg nul pihi.
42022016	Pihiyon ari naruk lahiyon aru hag toho fobik eke nahuk fug, Ninikni Allah wereg ambeg kuhukteg eneg mondabi fano welaruhuwon nahuk," ibag.
42022017	Ari ibareg kubag wibareg seneg lit sembahyang ibareg og isaruk lit, "Kubag tu walihipteg honori men fibir amek.
42022018	Anggur ahaluwe aru ketiya na fug angge welaruhukteg Allah ap obog toho Inikni aruhu sambil eneg ahaluwe nahuk," ibag.
42022019	Ari ibareg suburu roti wibareg sembahyang ibareg kut-kut otsi og isaruk lit, "Nebe aru hit fahet og hisahukon og hisaruk lahi. An fahet wenggel Niyaruk lit welamuhuben suburu ari roho naruk lamuhup," ibag.
42022020	Ibagma suburu roti nibagma ik kubag wibareg hinang isaruk lit, "Ik kubag aru wene keron werehen Allahn sali ibahon hikir amag ulug Namep hit fahet wilip aruhu," ibag.
42022021	"An fahet wabukag ulug huruwe lamin peruk lit werehon ino at inggiket An ninggiket suburu seneg lit naruk lahe.
42022022	At ap kinangmon atfahon Allahn perisiyon fam lahu. We At huruwe lahu ahun ino eneg indi anggin amag," ibag.
42022023	Ari ibag ane fahet it-it enele sahaltuk lit haren ano anden ano ulug it-it enele sahaltuk latfag.
42022024	Yesus otsi enele sahaltuk lit nit aruma welaheyon sehelimu misig sa suwon aruhu ulug umung-umung atuk latfag.
42022025	Umung-umung atuk latfagma Yesusen, "Ap suwon kinangma werehonen ininggareg palimuwap taruk lit onotsi apmayap eneptuk. Fano fer enesug lit welahe uruk angge famen enele mingming eneg eneptuk.
42022026	Hit An notsi welahebon aruma ap suwon ari hag toho welamuhup fug. Hit sehelimu an suwon welahi urukon ino malik toron amag, hiyag hisaruk lit mingming heneptuk ahun ino henemingmingangge amag.
42022027	Nori, sak esetuk ahun suwon peruk lahep? Ik hinanggik larukon suwon peruk lahep?" ulug Yesusen otsi umung isaruk lit, "Sak esetuk ahun ino suwon fug? An hit sehelimu welahiyon aru ik hinanggik larukon hag toho welahi," ibag.
42022028	"Nori, ap kinangmonen wal Niyarukmu hit eneg Numbahalug la fug angge welatikip.
42022029	Ninikniyen At ibam ngiyap Naptisi hag toho Anden hir oho ngiyap henebuhuk.
42022030	Allah ibamen suburu men ik men An men mangno roho naruk lit lehoma heriyeg lit Yakub umalikisi nisanggowen arimanowen ondohowonen tohon unggum kong isaruk lamuhup," ibag.
42022031	"Simon nare, Iblisen Allah fam heng turuk lit yasi ebe men uru men enetukon hag toho hit hinindi ninap henebuhuk ulug Allah fam heng tirisi.
42022032	Heng tirisi angge haren Allah fam wenggeltuk ane hindi nin aruhu rohon ulug Allah fam sembahyang ihi. Hat hindi hebeloho anggar atuk halug hori winon oho inindi wirikap eneptuk laruhun," ibag.
42022033	Ari ibagma Petrusen, "Nowe, Hat hele wat Habuhup halug an oho hele wat nabuhup. Hat war aruhun halug an oho ambiyeg war amuhuk," ibag.
42022034	Ibagma Yesusen, "Petrus, yoho hubanggo suwe ayam ele uk fugmu haren hinahanam hun ari an napeleg ulug awiya wamihinon ari tem toho ihi," ulug Petrus fam ibag.
42022035	"Anden mon heneptuk lit ilit uang kilaptukon, sum suburu yunggatukon, sepatu hunuyugmu kilaptukon men eleg angge mon heneptikik angge famen hit heneseher angge wereg latisi?" ibagma iren, "Nenesehet eleg latisi," ibag.
42022036	Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Ketiya re ilit uang kilaptuk angge suburu yunggatukon men hilalug laruk lamuhup. Mun angge man angge hininggikmu eleg halug henesum henebemon nonggoloho ap winon og isahupmu iren ayeg waroho og hisahubon fam karog olokon onggo paluhup," ibag.
42022037	Ari ibareg Yesusen, "Wene atam hahatfahon hikit toho An nubam turuk lamuhup. 'Ar oho siyag ane turuk inap enesehelimu weregma puhup,' ulug haharoho imbibahon ari hikit toho An nubam turuk lamuhup," ibag.
42022038	Ari ibagma Otsiyen Yesus fam, "Nonowe, karog piren tu wereg," ibagma Yesusen, "Ita wereg," ibag.
42022039	Ari ibareg Yesus otsi men wilip atfareg atam Zaitun punumu laruk latfag hag toho ino sambil oho Zaitun punumu libag.
42022040	Lul pibag ambeg ino libareg Otsi fam, "Siyahonen wal hisahu rohon sembahyang uruk lamek," ibag.
42022041	Ibareg tot yat toho libareg Elenggen fam hur atfareg kunuk teg lit sembahyang uruk lit,
42022042	"Allah Nikni, ik kubag famon ari namin fuhen hilak watmin pemihin halug hilak watnihinon ari Anden peruk lahi ane fug, Haren peruk lahen hag toho atmisi," ibag.
42022043	Ari ibagma malaikat monde fibahon inam atfareg ele ubam uruk lit ineyap tibag.
42022044	Yesus akol anggolo haruk lit Indi pong-pong angge turuk lit sembahyang urukmu lisag famen mep tep-tep wamburuk hag toho lisag tep-tep kinangma wamburuk latfag.
42022045	Sembahyang ibareg larukmen Otsi inindi anggin toho wereg lit nohorukmu libareg
42022046	Otsi fam, "Nungge fahet nohoruk lahep? Siyahonen hinindi ninap henebuhu rohon hinil wirik toho wereg lit sembahyang uruk lamek," ibag.
42022047	Yesus ele urukmen Otsi nisanggowen itano misig unuk Yudas inowen ap anggolo hondog eneplug at enelukema watfareg mako pug toho hi rimin ulug Yesus iraham libag.
42022048	Iraham libagma Yesusen te, "Yudas nare, At ap atik ibahon ino mako pug toho hi ruruk lit ap aruma hiyag isaruk lahen?" ibag.
42022049	Yesus otsi At men welatfahon arimanowen Yesus ki rurukmu yer isibareg, "Nonowe, ap ari roho turukon aruma karog fam unusul," ulug kapal hibag.
42022050	Kapal hibareg Ot misihen imam onowe suwon amingmingangge eke karog fam watuk lit isanggo pikit filon kong tibisibag.
42022051	Kong tibisibagma Yesusen imbisiyek ibareg isanggo ubalma yaho fisibag.
42022052	Yaho fisibareg imam onowesi suwon men Allah wene uruk ibam foroho inap men iniknisi suwon men unubam Ele uruk lit, "An ap enebe unusulug enenggengge hilaruk ahun hag toho welahimu karog men e paleg men senerehepteg wabul ulug wahep?
42022053	An hit sehelimu likiya hupmu Allah wene uruk ibam welatikik angge famen ki Naptikip fug. Hiren turuk lahebon ari hik tegma eneg tuk hag teg lahep," ibag.
42022054	Yesus senetfareg imam onowe suwon ibam hondoholug larukmu Petrus ombolim laruk latfag.
42022055	Imam ibam owahalma ap indok munggalfareg walinggoho heriyegma Petrus oho it sehelimu heriyeg latfag.
42022056	Hiyap ap suwon amingmingangge ekeyen Petrus indokma heriyegma yet hibareg fuki roho kim haruk lit, "Ap tu oho At men wereg latisiyon," ibag.
42022057	Ari ibagma Petrusen awiya waruk lit, "Hun ari an napeleg," ibag.
42022058	Tot weregman ap winonen pen hibareg, "Har oho it min welatikin," ibagma Petrusen, "An fug," ibag.
42022059	Ibareg nin tot welatfagma ap winonen ele haro roho uruk lit, "We tem toho hun tu Galilea ahun angge re At men ambiyeg welatisi," ibag.
42022060	Ari ibagma Petrusen, "An fug, haren uruk lahen ane ari an napeleg," ulug awiya warukmu suwe ayam ele ibag.
42022061	Ele ibagma Yesus hebeloho Petrus yet hibag. Yet hibagma Petrusen ayam ele yoho hubanggo uwan uk fugmu haren An nubahet hinahanam awiya wamihin ulug Nonowe inowen hiyag nerehekon ino tem toho ehek ulug indi anggar atfagma
42022062	wilip atfareg indimu siyag toho uba yatuk latfag.
42022063	Yesus senetfag inap arimanowen Ele ying turuk lit Orohole sale fibareg watuk lit, "Ap san Nuwatuk peruk lahen, hiyag nisimin," uruk latfag.
42022065	Enele anggolo uruk lit Inggaliyap turuk latfag.
42022066	Sakan tibagma o likiya Yahudi inap onowesi suwon men imam onowesi suwon men Musa wene onoluk inap men palu atfareg Yesus enelukema unduhuk fibag.
42022067	Unduhuk fibagma it ap suwon arimanowen enele uruk lit, "Hat Mesias fobik waruhu uruson Hat aru halug Hele hiyag nisimin," ibagma Yesusen, "Kapal Neyehebon ari fahet fag toho hiyag heselema tem toho pelep fug.
42022068	Anden hit kapal heselema hiren An hiyag Netep fug.
42022069	Ketiya famen At ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino Allah ineyon inggik pikit fil heriyeg lit welaruhu," ibag.
42022070	Ari ibagma iren te, "Ari ehen halug Allah amloho welahen?" ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Hat Allah amloho welahen ehebon ari hiren ehep," ibagma
42022071	iren, "Inggareg ambilik fam fag toho ehekma nungge fahet ap winon kapal enebul," ulug uruk latfag.
42023001	It palu roho welatfahon arimano in atfareg Yesus hondoholug ap suwon Pilatus ambeg laruk latfag.
42023002	Libareg Pilatus ubam hiyag utuk lit, "Hun aruwen nonotsi inindi nonghonga feseruk lit Kaisar ino uang og um fug teg uruk lit Inggareg fahet Mesias ap suwon welahi ulug ari-ari urukmu niren holtukuk," ulug un-un ane Pilatus hiyag utuk latfag.
42023003	Pilatus hiyag utuk latfagma Pilatusen Yesus hinog og haruk lit, "Hat Yahudi inap onowe suwon welahen?" ibagma Yesusen, "We haren ehen ari," ibag.
42023004	Ari ibagma Pilatusen imam onowesi suwon men ap arimano men hiyag isaruk lit, "Anden umung hihimu siyag ane tirisiyon ehekon holihi fug," ibagma iren enele ine roho uruk lit,
42023005	"Hun aruwen uruk latisi ane re o Galilean ak tirisireg ap inindi kahal enebil laruk latisireg o Yudea tuma waharisi," uruk latfag.
42023006	Ari uruk latfagma Pilatusen hol hibareg hun aru Galilea ahun ano ulug kapal isibagma
42023007	Yesus Galilea ahun ulug hiyag itfahon oluk atfagma it Galilea inap Herodes apma wereg angge re Herodesen unggum ari kong timisiyen ambeg walug lalihip ulug hiyag isibag. Ari tibag sambil ino oho Herodes o Yerusalem weregma ambeg walug libag.
42023008	Herodes ambeg walug libagma Herodesen hun aru fahet anggolo urukmu holtuk latikik angge poholman turuk ane an nalukeman telepma yet hele, Ebe oho yet hele peruk latikik Ahun ino yoho walug wahasa ulug ahiyeg hibag.
42023009	Ahiyeg hibareg Yesus mun ane man ane roho kapal haruk latfagma Yesusen ele eleg angge welatfag.
42023010	Ele uk fug angge weregma imam onowesi men Musa wene onoluk inap onolohotma in atfareg un-un ane anggolo lombog turuk latfag.
42023011	Lombog turuk latfagma Herodes men otsi men arimanowen Yesus unuk lahap-pilap isaruk lit Inggaliyap tibareg sum ap suwonen wan turukon laha fisibareg suhuloho Pilatus ambeg walug lalihip ibag.
42023012	Herodes men Pilatus men ir oho seli roho welatfag angge famen ino sambil mangno atfag.
42023013	Imam onowesi men Yahudi inap onowesi men ap winonet palu enepfareg Pilatusen hiyag isaruk lit,
42023014	"Ap aruwen inindi kahal eneptuk ulug hiren an nambeg walug wahep. Anden ap aru hinog-og harukmu hinilen hehep. Siyag ane tirisiyon misig oho holihi fug angge famen hiren un ane Ubam lombohap tirikip.
42023015	Herodesen oho hinog-og hehekma siyag ane tirisiyon eleg ulug nin suhuloho aliyek ehekma alem anggin toho Ubam umbuk fug tehen ware fisiyek uk fug teg lahi.
42023016	E paleg fam eneg notsiyen wabusama lamisi," ibag.
42023017	O Paskah seni suwon esetuk sambil ari aren ap hele warehon misig-misig lol eseheg turuk latfag.
42023018	Ap welatfahon arimano enebe obog tohowen enele hum toho uruk lit, "Barabas eneg lol nisamihinteg ap aru il eleha fisin," ibag.
42023019	Hun Barabas inowen ap suwon enele nirim ulug tog aptuk lit ap eke ware fisibagma o penjara kilapfagma welatfag.
42023020	Ap arimano enele hum toho uruk lit Barabas lol nisimin uruk latfagma Pilatusen ele ine roho, "Yesus loloho wili fesemin," ibag.
42023021	Ibagma enele uruk latfahon arimanowen enele hum toho hun aru e fam telukag eneg uruk latfag.
42023022	Uruk latfagma Pilatusen inggik hinahaneg angge, "Hun aruwen siyag-siyag ane nungge tirisimu uruk lahep? Alem anggin toho Ubam umbuk fug tehen ware fisiyek uk fug tehen e paleg fam eneg notsiyen wabusama lamisi," ibag.
42023023	Ari ibagma it arimanowen enele hum toho at ele pilaptuk lit e fam telukag ulug heng turuk latfareg it enele palimu atfag.
42023024	Palimu atfagma Pilatusen iren pehesa ane tukag ulug inggik obog isibag.
42023025	Inggik obog isibareg Barabas tog aptuk lit ap eke ware fisibag ahun ino o penjaran inggik loloho wilip isibareg hit pehebon hag toho e fam teltihip ulug Yesus og isibag.
42023026	Yesus teltul ulug walug larukmen Simon Kirene ahun waharukmu salkal ibareg senetfareg teltuk ahen ino umaloma ha ribibareg Yesus ombolim lul ibag.
42023027	Ap anggolo mondoko ambiyeg laruk lit hiyap eke laruk lit uba yatil laruk latfag.
42023028	Uba yatil laruk latfagma Yesusen hebeloho kim isaruk lit, "Hit Yerusalem hiyap, An nubahet uba yabuk fug. Hininggareg fahet hunumalikisi fahet uba yag taruk lamek.
42023029	Tot welamuhukmu aben enele uruk lit, 'Hiyap malik indag ta fug angge ibili atukon men ag umaliken naruk elehon enehiyeg toho welamag,' uhup.
42023030	Tom fam enele uruk lit, 'Punu men tom menen kusoho hondo nenebiyek,' uhup.
42023031	Aben e olukon yaltukmu indoken folo-folo naruk eleg, aben e ilimon yaltukmu fululung toho naruk," ibag.
42023032	Yesus hondoholug laruk lit ap piren siyag-siyag ane turuk latfahon itano pinggi unusilihip ibahon itano men Yesus men ambiyeg hondog eneptuk latfag.
42023033	Hondog eneplug sili unuk "Ap unggul uwag silimu" libareg Yesus e fam tele fisibareg ap piren itano oho eke inggik pikit fil eke inggik hare fil tel enepfag.
42023034	Tel enepfagma Yesusen ele uruk lit, "Nikni, An ninggik e fam tel Nabehesa inap aruma it enepelehen inindi anggat teg elehen tehesama it fahet Hat hindi ahe laharukon eleg amag," ibag. Yesusen ari ibagma At asum san hilamisi ulug telfag inap arimanowen eneg atuk angge hik turuk latfag.
42023035	Ap anggolo unduhuk lit it turukon fahet kilap enesug latfag. Yahudi inap onowesi suwon arimanowen Yesus inggaliyap turuk lit, "An Allahn mumal Naptisiyon uruk lit ap winon fanowap eneptuk latisi angge tem toho Mesias ap obog toho fanowap enebuhuwon wereg halug Inggarehen oho fanowap tawag," uruk latfag.
42023036	Sehen seneg inap welatfahon arimanowen oho Inggaliyap turuk lit anggur ahaluwe sihon og Utuk lit,
42023037	"Hat Yahudi inap onowe halug Hinggareg hamuwen fanowap taruk tin," uruk latfag.
42023038	Unggul palimu hahatfahon ari, "Yahudi inap onowe suwon tu," ulug hahatfag.
42023039	Ap piren Yesus men tel enepfahon misihen Inggaliyap turuk lit, "Hat te Mesias ino fug? Hinggareg fanowap tamihinteg nir oho fanowap nenebin," ibag.
42023040	Ari ibagma areyen are komo ruruk lit, "Har oho e fam tel nenebehesa angge famen Allah fam hakol haruk lahen fug?
42023041	Nit nunuseheson ari turukuk ane fahet ayeg waroho e fam tel nenebehesa. Hun aru re siyag ane oho eke tirisi fug angge famen telehesa," ibag.
42023042	Ari ibareg Yesus fam te, "Hat ap suwon hag toho waruhun halug an fahet Hat hapeleg am fug," ibag.
42023043	Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Yoho hat min An min Allah wereg ambeg kinang fanoma welamul," ibag.
42023044	Welatfagma mo anum pulmu weregma hik atfareg mo il hililip teg latfareg mo haya ririkim sakan tibag.
42023045	Mo il hilihip tegma o Allah wene uruk ibam sum sokolma latuk asum ino pul ke pilang tibisik wambibag.
42023046	Yesusen ele hum toho uruk lit, "Nikni, An nahime fanowon Hat hinggikmu embemin," uruk lit sat eleg atfag.
42023047	Sehen seneg inap onowe inowen Yesus ari roho uruk lit war atukmu yet hibareg, "Ap aru we tem toho Indi pikiron war aha," uruk lit Allah wel til laruk latfag.
42023048	Allah wel til laruk latfagma ap anggolo unusurukmu yet usul ulug watfahon arimano Yesus war atukmu yet hibag ane fahet inindi anggin atfagma inindi wat til inibam libag.
42023049	Yesus men ambiyeg laruk latfahon arimano men hiyap o Galilean Yesus men ambiyeg laruk latfahon arimano men yatma unduhuk lit tibag ane ari yer isaruk latfag.
42023050	Ap misig unuk Yusuf ino ibam o Arimatea Yudea kinang fam werehon ino welatfag. Allah ap obog toho Inikni arik waruhu ulug oluk toho wereg lit ubabut fano roho indi pikit toho welatfag. Hun ino Yahudi onowesi palu rurukmu ar oho laruk latfagma it arimanowen Yesus wabukag ulug enele sahaltukmu Yusuf ino oho libareg Yesus wabuhup fug peruk lahi ulug hiyag isibag.
42023052	Hun Yusuf ino Pilatus ambeg libareg Yesus warehon hiyag nimin ulug heng tibag.
42023053	Heng tibagma Pilatusen fano wak lamihin ibagma Yesus wareg angge pilabe fibareg sum yanggowon fam hililip tibareg walug libareg owik ap warehon kilapfag fuhon ino kilabe fibag.
42023054	Kilapfag sambil ari sono wene uhuk ulug yoho hupmu olma welamul ulug Yesus owikmu kilapfag.
42023055	Hiyap o Galilean Yesus men ambiyeg laruk latfag hiyap arimanowen ebe wareg angge owikmu kilaptukmu yet hul ulug ambiyeg libareg owik ino pen hibareg inibam libag.
42023056	Libareg Yesus ebene are ribik lahukon ulug ahaluwe amben fanowon tug toho imbibag. O wene uruk sambil ino Musa wene onoluk inap turuk latfag ane hikit toho olma welatfag.
42024001	Hiyap itano wene ibahon ino likiyamon hubet-habet ahaluwe amben fanowon tug toho imbibahon wibareg owik Yesus imbibag ambeg ino libag.
42024002	Libareg yet harukmen helep sok latuk ahalep ino imbiloho ilanma weregma yet hibag.
42024003	Yet hibareg owik elman kim harukmen Yesus ebe wareg angge imbibag ambeg eleg latfag.
42024004	Eleg latfagma inindi su atfagma nanggintul ulug turukmen ap piren sum yanggowon umbagpag turukon wan tehon iniraham unduhuk latfag.
42024005	Unduhuk latfagma hiyap itano enekolen onorohole kunuk toho weregma ap piren itanowen hiyap itano fam, "At oluk wereg angge famen ap warehon emberuk ambeg nungge fahet yami rik wahep?
42024006	Allahn Olukap tehekma At tuma eleg. At Galilea wereg lit hiyag hisaruk lit,
42024007	'Ap kinangmon atfahon ino ap siyag ane turuk inap og isahupmu e fam teloho ware fesuhupmu inggik pirenam wareg welaruhureg hinahaneg angge Oluk aruhu,' ulug hiyag hisarisiyon ino hinindi honoluk toho welamek," ibag.
42024008	Ari ibagma Yesusen hiyag isibag ane fahet inindi anggar atfagma
42024009	owikmuwen suhuloho waharuk lit Yesus otsi nanggoloben men Ori winon men Yesus owikmu emberusa ambeg elegma hehe ulug hiyag isa libag.
42024010	Hiyap itano ununuk te Maria ibam Magdala hiyap ino men Yohana men Yakobus isinga Maria ino men owikmu libag hiyap itano welatfag. Nin hiyap winon eke it ambiyeg libahon arimano menen Yesus otsi hiyag isaruk latfag.
42024011	Hiyag isibagma Yesus otsi arimanowen, "Henele si ane uruk lahep ulug niren te tem toho peruk lahe fug," uruk latfag.
42024012	Ari uruk latfagma Petrus ino in atfareg folo-folo owikmu libareg kilap harukmen sum hililip tibag asum ino eneg weregma kilap hibag. Kilap hibareg suhuloho waharuk lit Ebe elegman sum eneg hihi ulug indi su atfagma wenggeltil waharuk latfag.
42024013	O ino sambil Yesus otsi piren o Emaus lul ulug laruk latfag. Emaus ari o Yerusalemen larukon tot yat toho (dua jam) wereg latfag.
42024014	It piren itano kema laruk lit Yesus ware fisibag ane fahet enele il-il laruk latfag.
42024015	Enele il larukmu Yesus it enembolma watfareg it men ambiyeg laruk latfag.
42024016	Ambiyeg laruk lit Allahn inil muma fisibagma Yesus fahet amuwon pibareg ambiyeg laruk latfag.
42024017	Laruk lit Yesusen, "Hit henele il laruk lahebon nungge fahet ehep?" ulug umung isibag. Umung isibagma it enehummu siyahen unduhuk latfag.
42024018	Unduhuk lit ap itano misig unuk te Kleopas inowen Yesus ubam, "O Yerusalemen ketiya turusa ane ari ap pohon werehon obog toho onoluk atisi angge famen we Hat misig eneg Hapeleg toho welahen?" ibag.
42024019	Ibagma Yesusen, "O Yerusalemen nanggintuson fahet ehep," ulug kapal isibagma iren, "Yesus Nazaret ahun ino nabi Allahn monde ferisiyon inowen Ele ine roho ap hiyag isaruk lit Allah men ap obog toho iniline fano ane turuk lit ap hihir eneptuk lit welatisi.
42024020	Niren te, 'Nit Israel ninap aruma fanowap nenebuhuwen Allahn At monde ferisi,' peruk latukuk. Peruk latukuk angge famen imam onowesi men ap suwon menen At senetusareg unggum angginon Ubam emberusareg e fam teloho ware feseruson fahet uruk lahe," ibag. "Ari turusa sali o yoho inggik hinahaneg angge welahe.
42024022	Welahereg hiyap nit minon itanowen hubet owikmu Yesus emberusa ambeg ha lahasareg,
42024023	'Yesus ebe warehon ino elegman malaikat yer eseheyon itanowen Yesus oluk aha ulug hiyag nesehesama wahe,' ulug nenekolap nenebehesa.
42024024	Hiyap itanowen tam ari ulug hiyag nisa wahasama nonori arimanowen owikmu lahasareg hiyaben ehesa ane roho weregma hehesa angge famen At Yesus oluk ahayon Ebe hehesa fug," ibag.
42024025	Yesus ubam ari ibagma Yesusen hebeloho hiyag isaruk lit, "Hit hinindi sohu roho welahebon nungge fahet henepeleg toho welahep? Allah wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap nabi arimanowen suwesingga haharoho imbibahon ari we tem toho imbibag angge famen nungge fahet wenggel haruk lahep fug.
42024026	Mesias ap suwon indag aruhuwon ino Allahn pibahon te ap kinangmonen tam wabuhupmu Anden fobik fanowap tuhuk pibag," ulug hiyag isil laruk latfag.
42024027	"Nin Musan haharoho imbibahon men Allah wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap arimanowen haharoho imbibahon men ari Mesias fahet haharoho imbibag," ulug seleg toho hiyag isil laruk latfag.
42024028	Hiyag isil laruk lit o lul pibag ibam horogma libareg Yesusen lamin ulug turuk latfag.
42024029	Turuk latfagma Yesus fam te, "A, o hup atuk lit mo ubuk ehekma lamihin fug, nit men ambiyeg nohul," ulug enele ine roho ibag. Ari ibagma it men nohul ulug olma kibag.
42024030	Olma kibareg suburu nul ulug heriyeg lit Yesusen suburu wibareg seneg lit sembahyang ibareg kuroho og isibag.
42024031	Suburu og isarukmu Allahn inil selehap tibagma tu Yesus ulug inindimu onoluk atfagma hirag atfag.
42024032	Yesus hirag atfagma iren, "Kema waharuk lit Allah wene indam haharoho imbibahon ino hiyag nisarukmu yihi ulug ninindi oko laha," ibag.
42024033	Ibareg in atfareg o Yerusalem suhuloho libareg Yesus otsi nanggoloben men onori winon men palu roho weregma libag.
42024034	Libagma it welatfahon arimanowen, "Nonowe Yesus Allahn Olukap tehekma Simon iline ebenam aha," uruk latfag.
42024035	Iren ari roho urukmu it piren itanowen oho, "Kema laruk lit ap amuwon pehe angge famen suburu kuroho og nisarukmu Nonowe Yesusen og nisaruk ulug nonoluk aha," ulug hiyag isaruk latfag.
42024036	It palu roho wereg lit enele sahaltukmu Yesus it sehelimu unduhuk lit unubam Ele uruk lit, "Notsi, hinindi se roho welamek," ibag.
42024037	Ari ibagma it yuk libareg Yesus amungguwat waha ulug enekol hibag.
42024038	Enekol haruk lit weregma Yesusen te, "Nungge fahet yuk lahep? Nungge fahet henekol toho wereg lit amungguwat waha ano ulug hinindi piren toho wenggel haruk lahep?" ibag.
42024039	"Ninggik nuwatusa ambeg oho Nuyug nuwatusa ambeg oho kim Neyemek, An Honowe wirik toho wahi. An yet Niyaruk lahep hag toho mungguwat unu men uwag men wereg eleg, pete Niya maniyek," ibag.
42024040	Ari ulug hiyag isaruk lit Ninggik Nuyug kim Neyemek ulug unug hibag.
42024041	Unug hibagma Nonowe waha ulug enehiyeg toho welatfag angge famen inindimuwen te Yesus fug ano peruk lit weregma Yesusen, "Suburu tot foroho lahep?" ibag.
42024042	Ari ibagma ikan wirahowon kong toho og Itfagma it iniline oko wibareg nibag.
42024044	Ikan nibareg Ele hiyag isaruk lit, "Tam hit min ambiyeg wereg lit hiyag hisaruk latikik ane Musa men wene hiyag isaruk latfag inap nabi men Mazmur menen wene An fahet haharoho imbibag ane hikir aruhu ulug Allahn peruk ane ulug hiyag hisarikik," ibag.
42024045	Yesusen ari roho hiyag isaruk lit inindi anggarap enepfagma wene atam haharoho imbibahon inindimu seleg atfag.
42024046	"Allahn Mesias indag aruhuwon ino ap kinangmonen wabuhupmu inggik hinahaneg angge olukap tuhuk ulug Allahn pibahon fam atam welatfag inaben haharoho imbibag.
42024047	Yerusalem aruman ak tuhupteg o pumbuk munon-manon hiyag isaruk lit Mesias unuk uruk lit hit hunubahet Allahn olok peruk latisiyon eleg atisimu hiren siyag-siyag ane turuk lahebon umbusuhup ulug hiyag isahup.
42024048	Indam hahatfag ane roho atisiyon hit hiniline teko larisi.
42024049	Nikniyen og hisahuk ulug sali palfahon ino Anden og hisahuk. O Yerusalem aru welamuhupmu Nikniyen hinineyap henebuhumu eneg o aruwen wilip amuhup," ibag.
42024050	Ari ibareg Yesusen otsi hondog eneplug o Yerusalemen wilip atfareg o Betania horogma libareg Inggik leg haruk lit hi enepfag.
42024051	Hi eneptuk li itano Allahn Yesus lisoho wibagma it embeselug poholma lahibag.
42024052	Poholma lahibagma Otsi kinangma hur atuk lit sembahyang ibareg enehiyeg hibareg o Yerusalem suhuloho libag.
42024053	Libareg Allah wene uruk ibam wereg lit likiya hupmu Allah wel turuk latfag.
43001001	Allahn pohol kinang uwan wal tuk fugmu wene aru tam welatfag. Wene aru Allah men ambiyeg welatfag. Wene aru oho Allah men ambi reg latfag.
43001002	Pohol kinang uwanma wene oho Allah men ambiyeg welatfag.
43001003	Allahn mun angge man angge wene famen eneg wal tibag. Mun angge man angge wene fam wal tibag fuhon te wereg eleg.
43001004	Wene aru famen mun angge man angge onolukap eneptukmu fano wereg. Onolukap eneptukon inowen ap fahet o seleg fanowon unubam emberuk.
43001005	Seleg ariyen hik teg ambeg umbagpag turukmu hik ariyen seleg atukon mapmu ruk fug teg.
43001006	Ap eke Allahn monde fibahon ino watfag, unuk te Yohanes.
43001007	Yohanesen seleg ino ilen hibareg hiyag isahukmu holuhupteg ap obog toho inindimu we tem toho puhup ulug watfag.
43001008	Yohanes ino o seleg hag toho watfag fug, aren o seleg hibahon ino hiyag isamin ulug watfag.
43001009	Seleg mondabi welaruhuwon ino kinangma waharuk lit ap obog toho unubam umbagpag tuhu.
43001010	At tam welatfag. At ino himbisig Allahn pohol kinang wal tibag angge famen kinangen At haruk latfag fug.
43001011	At ino Nangginang yugmu ulug watfag angge famen Oriyen te Angginang yuhon fam waha pibag fug.
43001012	Angginang yuhon fam waha pibahon arimanowen At unuk fam tem toho wenggel haruk latfagma Allah umalikisi amuhup ulug unduhuk fisibag.
43001013	It arimano indag atfahon ap enemep famen fug, ap enehaluwe famen fug, aben perukon fam fug, Allahn perukon fam eneg indag atfag.
43001014	Wene ino famen ap atfareg At nit nenesehelimu wereg. Allahn unuk suwap tirisimu niren yet harukuk. Namloho misig eneg ulug Ikniyen Unuk suwap tirisireg lehoma emberisireg At indi reg hag toho nir oho tik-tem toho Indi nenesug.
43001015	At fahet Yohanesen hiyag isaruk lit, "At ino tu fahet tam hiyag hisaruk latikik. An nombolim waruhu irikikon ino naluke fil wereg. An uwanma At ino tam welatfag," ulug hiyag isibag.
43001016	Aren nit obog toho Indi nenesug ane kobog toho umbusuk fug teg.
43001017	Allahn komo neneptuk ane Musa famen holtukuk, Ninikni Allah inowen Indi nenesug lit tem toho peruk ane Yesus Kristus famen nonoluk atisi.
43001018	Ap misihen oho Allah harisi fug. Amloho misig enehon ino Ikni alukema werehon inowen fag toho hiyag nisarisi.
43001019	Yahudi inap o Yerusalem welatfahon arimanowen imam inap men Lewi inap men Yohanes ambeg lalihipteg hat sa ulug kapal halihip ulug mon enepfagma libareg kapal hibagma Yohanesen fag toho hiyag isibag.
43001020	Aren awiya wa fug angge hiyag isaruk lit, "An te Mesias ap obog toho fanowap enebuhuwon ino fug," ibag.
43001021	Ari ibagma iren te, "At fug halug hat te sa? Hat Elia ano?" ulug kapal hibagma, "An Elia fug," ibag. Ari ibagma iren te, "Wene hiyag isaruk ahun nabi eke waruhu ulug hahatfahon ino har ano?" ulug kapal hibagma, "Ari an fug," ibag.
43001022	Yohanesen ari ibagma iren te, "Ari ehenma hat sa? Nit mon nenebehesa inap arimanowen kapal nisa nowen hat hinggareg fahet fag toho hiyag nisimin," ibag.
43001023	Iren ari ibagma aren te, "Yesayan haharoho emberuk lit ap eke anggenma werehon inowen ele hi roho uruk lit Ninikni suwon waruhu abunggalem pikit toho yaho feruk lamek ulug Yesayan haharoho imbibahon hiyag isarukon ino an aru welahi," ibag.
43001024	Ap mon enepfahon arimano Farisi inaben mon enepfahon welatfag.
