43001025	It welatfahon arimanowen, "Hat Mesias men Elia men wene hiyag isaruk ahun waruhu ibahon ino waharikin fug halug te haren nungge fahet ap ikma pilap eneptuk lahen?" ulug kapal hibag.
43001026	Kapal hibagma aren te, "Anden ik fam eneg pilap eneptuk lahi. Ap misig aru hiren haruk lahep fuhon hit henesehelimu unduhuk lit wereg.
43001027	At ino Alukema an larukmu At ino an nombolim waruhu. An siyag nahun nubam sepatu lole Nubahin uhu fug," ibag.
43001028	Enele ibag ambeg ari Yohanesen ap ikma pilap eneptuk latfag ambeg ino o Betania ik Yordan fumag filen enele ibag.
43001029	Likiyamon te Yesus ino Yohanes ambeg waharukmu yet hibareg hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap kinangmonen siyag ane turukon elehap tuhuwen Allah ambohom domba tu waharuk.
43001030	Anden hiyag hisarikikon At ino tu fahet tam hiyag hisaruk lit, 'An Aluke fil weregma nombolim ap misig waruhuwon ino an uwanma At ino tam welatfahon waruhu,' ulug hiyag hisarikik.
43001031	An oho At napeleg anggeyen Israel inap At fahet onoluk aruhu ulug ik fam pilap enebik waharikik," ibag.
43001032	Ibareg Yohanesen hiyag isaruk lit, "Allah hime fanowon poholman suwe yalma hahon wambik waharisireg Ubam weregma yet harikik.
43001033	An oho At napeleg angge famen ik fam pilap eneptuk laruhun ulug Allah an mon naptisiyon inowen nubam Ele uruk lit, 'Hime fanowon wambik waruhureg ap misig Ubam weregma yet hahunteg At inowen Allah hime fanowon ap og isahuwon tu puhun,' ulug nubam irisi.
43001034	Allah amloho ino tu ulug nilen harikikteg fag toho hiyag hisarikik," ulug hiyag isibag.
43001035	Likiyamon Yohanes otsi piren men enele tam ibag ambeg itano unduhuk lit weregman
43001036	Yesusen it pisan isalug larukmu yet hibag. Yet hibareg Yohanesen otsi unubam ele hiyag isaruk lit, "Allah ambohom domba waharukon tu yet hemek," ibag.
43001037	Ibag ane ino otsi pirenen hol hibareg Yesus ombolim libag.
43001038	Ombolim larukmen Yesusen hebeloho yer isibareg Aren, "Nungge yami ril waharuk lahep?" ulug kapal isibagma iren te, "Nonowe, Hat welahen ambeg kema welahen?" ulug umung hibag.
43001039	Umung hibagma Aren te, "Kim halihiben maniyek," ibagma watfareg iren kim hibareg o ari sambil At men ambiyeg weregman hupmu atfag. Yesus men libag sul ari mo haya rurukmu laruk latfag.
43001040	Yohanesen ibag ane hol hibareg Yesus ombolim libahon itano misig unuk te Andreas, at ino Simon Petrus are welatfag.
43001041	Andreas ino are Simon men tam ambiyeg atfareg ubam hiyag utuk lit, "Mesias fobik waruhu uruk latfahon ino ninilen hehe," ulug hiyag itfag. Mesias ino Yunani inap enele roho Kristus nit fanowap nenebuhuwon fahet uruk.
43001042	Andreasen are Simon Yesus ambeg hondoholug libagma Yesusen at kim hibareg, "Hat te Simon, Yohanes amloho, hat hunuk Kefas suwal haptuk lahi," ibag. Kefas ari Yunani inap enele roho Petrus, nit nenele roho "helep ineyon" fahet uruk.
43001043	Likiyamon Yesusen o Galilea lul ulug turukmen Filipus men ambi atfareg, "An min ambiyeg lul," ibag.
43001044	Filipus ino ibam Betsaida ahun, Andreas men Petrus men inibam ambimu welatfag ahun watfag.
43001045	Filipus ino kema laruk lit Natanael men ambi atfareg ubam ele uruk lit, "Musa men ap wene tam hiyag isaruk latfag inap nabi menen ap misig fobik waruhu ulug tam haharoho imbibahon ino niren hehe, At ino Yesus Yusuf Nazaret ahun amloho ino," ibag.
43001046	Ari ibagma Natanaelen te, "O Nazaret inowen fanowon wilip am hag teg?" ulug ubam ibag.
43001047	Ari ibagma Filipusen te, "Nare ma, ambiyeg lulteg yet hamihin," ibagma hondoholug libagma Yesusen Natanael waharukmu yet hibareg, "Israel ahun ele si uk fug angge inggik apmane laruk elehon tu waharuken yet hemek," ibag.
43001048	Ari ibagma Natanael inowen te, "Nangginoho an fahet holuk teg?" il larikim Yesusen te, "Filipusen hat wol habuk fugmu Anden hat e ara alma weregma hiyarikik," ibag.
43001049	Ari ibagma Natanaelen at ubam ele uruk lit, "Nowe, Hat Allah amloho. Israel inap Onowe Hat welahen," ibag.
43001050	Ibag ane fahet Yesusen hebeloho hiyag utuk lit, "Anden hat e ara alma weregma hiyarikikon tu ihi ane fahet Allah amloho wereg ulug An fahet wenggel haruk lahen? Ari tot tohon hehen, fobik su ane tuhukon yet hahun," ibag.
43001051	Ari ibareg nin Yesusen, "Pohol fo regma Allah amingmingangge malaikat At ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino wereg ambeg lahuk wambuk turukmu yet hahun ulug ari tem toho hiyag hutuk lahi," ibag.
43002001	O hinahaneg sambil Galilea kinangon fam o Kana hiyap hilarukon fahet seni esetuk sul Yesus isinga oho welatfag.
43002002	Yesus otsi men oho seni ino ambiyeg nul ulug wol enepfag.
43002003	Wol enepfagma watfareg weregman anggur ahaluwe narukon eleg atfagma Yesus isingan amloho fam, " Anggur ahaluwe eleg ahama welahe," il larikim
43002004	Yesusen uruk lit, "Nisinga, Anden nungge ane hiyag hitmin," ibareg, "Anden tuk teg ane uwan lahi," ibag.
43002005	Yesusen ari ibagma Isingan seni esetuk latfag inap arimano unubam te, "Aren hiyag hisamisi ane roho eneg tilihip," ibag.
43002006	Seni esetfag ambeg horogma itano kubag falfaliken kinang fam lalfahon imbik watfag. Kubag arimano Yahudi inaben suburu nuk oho lit ininggik unuyug ik umatuk ane roho kubag humon imbik watfahon welatfag.
43002007	Weregman Yesusen ap seni esetuk latfag inap hiyag isaruk lit, "Kubag arima ik ololop tibil aliyek," ibagma ololop toho hinanggo feruk latfag.
43002008	Hinanggo fibagma Yesusen te, "Ik tot hinanggoho walihipteg seni ngi roho eserehek ahun ino og irik lalihip," ibagma hinanggoho walug libag.
43002009	Walug libagma hun seni ngi roho esetfag ahun inowen nek harukmen anggur ahaluwe unduk turuk latfagma nunggeyen teg aha ulug apeleg toho weregman we amingmingangge ik hinanggo feruk latfag inap arimanowen eneg onoluk teg latfag. Hun ino apeleg toho hiyap hilibag ahun ino wol tibareg
43002010	hiyag utuk lit, "Ap winonen oho ahaluwe fanowon tam hinang isarukmu naruk halug tot nenek turukmu siyahon hinang isaruk angge famen haren fanowon foroho lit welahen," ibag.
43002011	Ari tibag ane Yesusen enehangge eke uwan tuk fugmu enehangge tamon ari Galilea kinang fam o Kanaen tibag. Fobik fano ane tuhukon yet hahup ulug enehangge tibibag. Enehangge tibibag ane ino Yesus otsiyen yet hibareg Yesus fahet tem toho ulug inindi wenggel haruk latfag.
43002012	Ari tibareg Yesus isinga men Otsi men Ori men ambiyeg o Kapernaum libareg hup pirenam hinahanam welatfag.
43002013	Yahudi inaben suburu roti sig elehon naruk sul Paskah sambil ino horog atfagma Yesus o Yerusalem fil libag.
43002014	Libareg Allah ibam kurukmen wam sapi men domba men suwe yalma men onggo paloho waruk lit uang men ayeg watuk inap oho heriyeg lit ayeg watukmu kim isibag.
43002015	Ari turukmu kim isibareg hele fetnengge mase roho ki reg lit enembohomet enebeyet Allah ibam inowen yanggaloho wilip enepfag. E pila uang emberuk ambeg ino hebel isibareg uang arimano kinang ke hilil isibagma linggik-longgo ibag.
43002016	Suwe yalma ayeg waroho waruk latfag inap arimano unubam, "Hiren angge aruma obog toho o aruwen hilalug lalihip. An Nikni ibam hiren mun angge man angge ayeg waroho waruk ibamap tirikip," ibag.
43002017	Yesusen ari turukmu Otsiyen yet hibareg wene haharehon te, "Allah ibam aru Nindi haruk lit indok olok turuk hag toho Nundama nolok hihi," ulug haharoho imbibag ane fahet wenggel hibag.
43002018	Yahudi inap arimanowen Yesus pet turuk lit, "Niren Hat fahet ari roho tuk teg ahun wereg pulen nungge fam wal himin, yet hulen," ulug kapal hibag.
43002019	Kapal hibagma Yesusen, "O Allah ibam aru halog tibisiyek, we hinahanam ubalma wiri fesuhuken," ibag.
43002020	Ari ulug hiyag isibagma Yahudi inaben, "Allah ibam aru witikim mo ilig am wirig am turukmen teng-teng angge larikim (empat puluh enam tahun) witfag angge famen Haren we o hinahanam wiruhuk ehen?" ibag.
43002021	Yesusen Allah ibam fahet ibahon aru Inggareg ebe fahet wenggel haruk lit ibag.
43002022	Fobik Yesus war atfareg Oluk atfagma Otsiyen Yesus ibag ane aru wenggel hibareg tam haharoho imbibag ane men Yesusen irisi ane men tem toho irisi ulug Otsiyen peruk latfag.
43002023	Suburu roti sig elehon naruk sul hari Paskah Yesus o Yerusalem weregma ap anggolowen Aren fano ane turukmu yet hibareg Yesus aru tem toho ulug At unuk fahet fano peruk latfag.
43002024	Ap arimanowen wenggeltuk ane Oluk tehen Inggareg fahet fag toho hiyag isibag fug.
43002025	Aben unundaman peruk ane Yesusen oluk tehen, "Ap tu ubabut fano, ap tu ubabut siyag ulug ap winonen hiyap Numuhup fug," peruk latfag.
43003001	Farisi ahun misig unuk te Nikodemus Yahudi inap onowe roho welatfag.
43003002	At ino hubanggo Yesus ambeg watfareg ele uruk lit, "Nowe, Allahn te Haren wene hiyag isaruk laruhun ulug mon Haptisiyon ino nit nonoluk. Haren turuk lahen ane ari aben tuk fug tohon turuk lahen. Allah men ambiyeg werehonen eneg ari tuk hag teg," ibag.
43003003	Ari ibagma Yesusen Nikodemus fam Ele uruk lit, "Ap kinangmon keron eke indag atuk eleg halug Allah weregma pen ha fug teg ulug we tem toho hiyag hutuk lahi," ibag.
43003004	Yesusen ari ibagma Nikodemusen, "Ap sabal angge famen nin fobik hebeloho nangginoho indag am teg? Isinga ahummu kulug nin suhuloho indag am teg?" ulug kapal hibag.
43003005	Kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Ap kinangmon ikman men Allah hime fanowon ino fam menen indag atuk eleg halug Allah suwon weregma kuk fug teg ulug tem toho hiyag hutuk lahi.
43003006	Ap ahaluwe fam indag atukon ari ap ahaluwe aruhu. Allah hime fanowon famen indag atukon ari Allah hime fanowon ngi aruhu.
43003007	Hit nin fobik indag amuhup hubam ihiyon ari fahet hindi anggin am fug.
43003008	Siyelu fu ruruk halug aplohok holtuk lahen angge famen kema filen watlug kema fikit laruk, ari hat hapeleg. Siyelu ari hag toho ap Allah hime fanowon famen indag atukon ari hag toho wereg," ibag.
43003009	Yesusen ari ibagma hun Nikodemus inowen, "Nangginoho ari teko la reg?" ulug kapal hibagma
43003010	Yesusen te, "Hat te Israel inap hiyag isarukon onowe hat welahen angge famen ari fahet hapeleg toho welahen?
43003011	Nit nonolukon te fag toho uruk lahe, ninil fam harukukon hiyag hisaruk lahe angge famen holtuk lahep fug ulug tem toho hubam uruk lahi.
43003012	Kinangmon fahet hiyag hisaruk lahimu holtuk lahep fug angge re poholmon fahet hiyag hisarukmu nangginoho holehep ha reg?
43003013	Ap misig oho poholma lahibag fug, At ap atik ibahon pohol filen wambik watfahon ino eneg lahuk teg lit wereg," ibag.
43003014	"Israel inap farema wereg lit Musan pisanggo e fam lehoma imbibag hag toho At ap atik ibahon ino oho lehoma umbuhupmu
43003015	ap At ubam wenggel harukon arimano mondabi Allah wereg ambeg onoluk welamuhup.
43003016	Allahn ap kinangmon Indi isaruk lit Amloho we misig eneg angge famen og isibag. Amloho fam wenggel harukon longgo uk fug angge Allah men mondabi onoluk welamuhup.
43003017	Allahn amloho kinangma monde fibahon te unggum ap unubam umbuhu ulug monde fibag fug, fanowap enebuhu ulug monde fibag.
43003018	Ap sa At ubam wenggel haruk halug Allahn alem angginon at ubam umbuhu fug. Ap sa At ubam wenggel haruk eleg halug at ino Allah amloho misig enehon ino Unuk fam wenggel haruk elehen alem angginon apma wereg.
43003019	Alem angginon ino tu: Kinangma seleg ino waharisi angge famen ap kinangmonen siyag ane turuk latuson arimano iren te hik fahet eneg inindi reg lit wereg.
43003020	Ap san siyag ane turuk halug siyag angge ino hirako welamag peruk lit seleg teg ambeg laruk ane nirim peruk.
43003021	Ap san fano ane turuk halug Allahn let naptukmu turuk lahi ane ari inam amag peruk lit seleg teg ambeg waharuk," ulug hiyag isibag.
43003022	Yesusen wene ari hiyag isibareg Otsi men Yudea kinang keyen libareg Otsi men ambiyeg wereg lit ap ikma pilap eneptuk latfag.
43003023	Yohanes inowen oho o Ainon ino o Salim horogma ik anggolo werehen aren ap ikma pilap eneptuk latfagma ap anggolo pilap nenebukag ulug waharuk latfag.
43003024	Yohanes ino penjara uwan kilabuk fugmu ari turuk latfag.
43003025	Turuk latfagma Yohanes otsi men Yahudi ahun misig men ap ikma pilap eneptuk ane fahet suwahal uruk latfag.
43003026	Suwahal uruk latfareg Yohanes ambeg watfareg, "Nonowe, ap ik Yordan fumag fil hat men ambiyeg welatikibon ino At ino fahet haren hiyag nisarikinon inowen ap ikma pilap eneptukmu ap obog toho Ambeg waharuk," ulug hiyag itfag.
43003027	Hiyag itfagma Yohanesen te, "Ap ekeyen nungge-nungge inggareg indiyen hila fug teg, we poholmonen og utukon eneg hila reg," ibag.
43003028	"Anden At ino fahet harikik ane tam irikikon ari harikin ulug an nubam kapal neyehep. An Mesias ino fug. An At alukema laruk laruhun ulug monde nubaharisiyon inowen hiyag hisarikik ane ari hit honoluk.
43003029	Aben hiyap hilamin perukon ino hilaruk halug ap ino ngi atuk. Ap ino ot iraham werehon inowen hiyap hilihi urukmu hol halug noweyen fano helehek peruk. Ot inowen peruk hag toho anden oho fano peruk lit nahiyeg toho welahi.
43003030	At ino su aruhu, an tot aruhuk," ibag.
43003031	Pali filen waharukon mun angge man angge palimu wereg. Kinang filen waharukon kinangma angge men ambiyeg wereg lit kinangma ane uruk. Pohol filen waharukon inowen mun angge man angge palimu wereg lit
43003032	harisi ane men holtisi ane men hiyag isarukmu ap misihen oho we tem toho peruk eleg.
43003033	Ap misihen harisi ane hiyag isarukmu we tem toho perukon inowen Allah faher oho we tem peruk.
43003034	Allahn hime fanowon ap og isarukon winako og isaruk eleg. Winako og isaruk eleg angge re ap sa Allahn monde ferukmu at inowen Allah wene hiyag isaruk.
43003035	Ikniyen Amloho Indi reg lit mun ane man ane obog toho Inggikmu emberisi.
43003036	Ap san Amloho fam wenggel haruk halug at ino Allah men mondabi oluk welaruhu. Ap san Amloho ele holtuk elehon onoluk wereg ambeg yet hahu fug, at ino Allahn olok perukon ubam welaruhu.
43004001	Yohanesen ap tor angge ikma pilap eneptisi angge famen Yesusen ap anggolo Ambeg waharukmu ikma pilap eneptuk urukmu Farisi inaben hol hibag.
43004002	Yesus amuwen ap ikma pilap enepfag fug, Otsiyen eneg pilap eneptuk latfag.
43004003	Yesusen ap ikma pilap eneptuk ane Farisi inap hol hibag ane Yesus oluk atfagma o Yudea embeselug o Galilea suhuloho libag.
43004004	O Yudea embeselug Samaria keyen laruk latfag.
43004005	Libareg o pumbuk misig Samaria kinang fam werehon unuk Sikhar libag. Yusuf ikni Yakuben yabuk lin isibag ambeg o ino horogma welatfag.
43004006	Libag ambeg ino Yakuben ik fabulfahon welatfag. Yesus kema larukmen mo anum pulmu atfagma Yakuben ik fabulfag ambeg ino saren kel tamin ulug iraham hur atfag.
43004007	Hur atfareg weregman Yesus otsi suburu ayeg waroho wak lul ulug olma libagma Samaria hiyap eke ik hinang tamin ulug watfag. Watfareg ik hinanggibagma Yesusen hiyap ino fam, "Ik oboken hinang Nimin," ulug heng tibag.
43004009	Heng tibagma Samaria hiyap inowen, "Hat Yahudi hahunen an Samaria nuhe fam ik hinang Nimin ehenon nangginoho heng nabehen," ibag. Samaria inap men Yahudi inap men mangno roho welahe fug ulug ari ibag.
43004010	Ari ibagma Yesusen te, "Allahn ap fanowap eneptuk ane men hat hubam ik hinang Nimin ehekon ino men holuk teg lalenma haren ik At ubam heng telen. Heng telenma Aren ik eleruk ahik hinang hetlep," ibag.
43004011	Yesusen ari ibagma hiyap inowen te, "Nowe, ik hinangguruk angge Haren tohon elehen fo reg ambeg aru apma rehen ik eleruk ahik fanowon ari Haren nangginoho hinang num teg?" ibag.
43004012	"Nunumba Yakuben ik hinangguruk ambeg habul nisibareg at inggareg men umalikisi men ambohom men ik aru naruk latfag angge famen Haren te An suwon, at toron peruk lahen?" ibag.
43004013	Ibagma Yesusen hebeloho hiyap ino fam, "Ap san ik haren ehenon aru narukmu nin fobik ik obok haruk laruhu.
43004014	Ik Anden hinang isaruk lahiyon aru narukmu mondabi ik obok eleg aruhu. Ik Anden hinang isaruk lahiyon aru narukmu at ino undama ik eleruk ahik fanowon wilip aruhumu at ebe mondabi oluk welaruhu. Ik eleruk ari firig am fug angge mondabi wiliptuk laruhu," ibag.
43004015	Ibagma hiyap inowen te, "Nowe, an ik obok haruk laruhuk fuhen tuma hinang ta waharuk ane nirimen ik Haren ehenon ino hinang nimin," ibag.
43004016	Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Ik ino hinang nimin ehenma lamihinteg hahun hondoholug tuma watmihin," ibag.
43004017	Ibagma hiyap inowen, "An nahun eleg," ibagma Yesusen, "Nahun eleg ehenon tem toho ehen.
43004018	Ap fuwaben oho latikinteg ketiya oho lahenon ari hahun fug. Nahun eleg ehenon tem toho ehen," ibag.
43004019	Ari ibagma hiyap inowen, "Nowe, Hat tem toho Allahn mon Haptisiyon nabi welahenma ketiya an nindi anggar aha," ibag.
43004020	Ari ibareg hiyap inowen, "Nit niniknisi unumbusagsiyen tom aru famen sembahyang uruk latfag angge famen hiren te o Yerusalemen eneg sembahyang uk hag teg uruk lahep," il larikim
43004021	Yesusen, "Nehe, tot welamuhupmu punu tu famen eneg o Yerusalemen eneg Ninikni fam sembahyang uhup fug. Ihi ane ari tem toho ehek peruk lamin.
43004022	Hit Samaria hinaben sembahyang uruk lit hinilen ha fuhon ubam sembahyang uruk lahep. Nit Yahudi ninap halug nonolukon Ubam sembahyang uruk lahe. Allahn ap fanowap eneptuk ane ari Yahudi inap sehelimuwen ak teberisi.
43004023	Teko lahu ihiyon ino aruhu sambil ketiya horog toho welahe. Ninikni ubam sembahyang uruk inap inindi pikit tohon eneg Allah hime fanowon unubam werehonen eneg sembahyang uk teg. Ari roho uruk inap fahet eneg Allahn fano peruk.
43004024	Allah men Hime fanowon men Ebe misig hag toho wereg. Ap san Ubam sembahyang imin peruk halug indi pikit tohon eneg Allah hime fanowon ubam werehonen eneg sembahyang uk teg," ibag.
43004025	Yesusen ari ibagma hiyap inowen, "Mesias unuk eke Kristus ino waruhu urukon an noluk. At waruhureg mun ane man ane obog toho Aren hiyag nisahu," ibagma
43004026	Yesusen, "At ino An, An hat hubam Nele uruk lahiyon tu," ibag.
43004027	Enele urukmu itano Yesus otsi arimano watfareg inindimuwen amu hiyap aru men nungge fahet enele uruk peruk latfag. Peruk latfag angge famen Yesus otsi itano misihen oho "Nungge wenggel hehenteg hiyap aru men henele uruk lahep," ulug umung hibag fug.
43004028	Umung hibag fugmu hiyap ino kubag ik hinanggurukon ino embeselug ibam libareg ap welatfahon arimano unubam hiyag isaruk lit,
43004029	"Ap misihen anden tirikik ane fag toho ehek ahun ino yet halihiben maniyek. At ino Kristus ap obog toho fanowap enebuhuwon ano," ibagma
43004030	it arimano o pumbuk inowen wilip atfareg Yesus ambeg watfag.
43004031	It ari turukmu itano Yesus otsiyen, "Nonowe, Hat suburu amin," ibagma
43004032	Aren, "Anden suburu hiren haruk lahep fuhon foroho lahi," ibag.
43004033	Ari ibagma Otsiyen it-it umung-umung atuk lit, "Ap ekeyen nungge og Erehekma nenggek," ibag.
43004034	Ibagma Yesusen otsi unubam, "An mon Naptisi ahun inowen yabuk wituk laruhun ulug hiyag Nitisimu yabuk wiri fuhukon ari naruk angge hag toho wereg," ibag.
43004035	"Hiren te pikalem uhan lahumu suburu wirik aruhu uruk lahep fug? Ari uruk lahep angge famen Anden tot hiyag hisamin: Yabuk o walinggoho werehon yet hemek, suburu wirik atisimu ebe yahaluk teg.
43004036	Suburu yahaltuk ahun ubam ngi ahunen onggo og utuk. Suburu yahaloho palu ruruk ahun ino mondabi oluk welaruhu. Ei yatuk ahun men ebe yahaltuk ahun men enebe mangno roho wereg lit enehiyeg haruk lamuhup.
43004037	Ap enele indit toho uruk ane fahet tem toho uruk peruk lamek: Ap misihen ei yatukmu ap ekeyen ebe yahal taruk ulug indit toho uruk.
43004038	Anden te hiren ei yatikip fug angge famen ebe yahalik lalihip ulug mon heneptuk lahi. Ap winonen sat toho yag tarusa angge famen hiren ebe yahal taruk lahep," ulug Otsi hiyag isibag.
43004039	Samaria inap anggolo o inowen watfag inap arimanowen Yesus fahet tem peruk latfag. Hiyap tuwen anden tirikik ane Yesusen fag toho ehek ulug ibag ane fahet tem toho peruk lit Yesus fam wenggel haruk latfag.
43004040	Samaria inap arimano Yesus ambeg watfareg, "Hat nit men ambiyeg welamuhuk," ulug heng tibagma Yesus it men weregman hup pirenam atfag.
43004041	Yesus it men wereg lit wene hiyag isarukon holtuk latfareg ap anggolowen At ubam wenggel haruk latfag.
43004042	Wenggel haruk latfag inap arimanowen hiyap ino fam enele uruk lit, "Haren tam hiyag nisarikinon ino holtukukteg tem toho perukuk angge famen ketiya At inggarehen hiyag nisarukmu holehereg ap kinangmon obog toho fanowap enebuhuwon tu ulug tem toho wenggel haruk lahe," ibag.
43004043	Yesus hup pirenam o Sikhar welatfareg Galilea fil laruk latfag.
43004044	Yesusen otsi hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap misig ibam ngi reg ambeg ino Allahn monde ferukmu wene hiyag isarukon ele holtuk eleg," ibareg o Galilea lul ibag.
43004045	O Galilea kibagma Galilea inap arimanowen fano waha pibag. It arimano o Yerusalem suburu roti sig elehon narukon fahet libahon arimanowen Aren o Yerusalemen fano ane turukmu yet harukuk angge re At ino fano waha pibag.
43004046	Yesus o Kana tam ik anggur ahaluwe lalfag ambeg ino suhuloho watfag. Watfareg weregma o Kapernaum ap suwon ibam foroho latfag ahun ino amloho ouk waruk latfag.
43004047	Ouk waruk latfagma Yesus Yudea embeselug Galilea waha urukon hol hibareg Ambeg watfag. Watfareg, "Namloho ouk waruk lit war am hag teg lit werehen haren hihit nitmihin," ulug heng tibag.
43004048	Ari ulug heng tibagma Yesusen ubam Ele uruk lit, "Poholmonen turuk ane hinilen yet haruk lahep fug halug hinindi anggar aruhu fug," ibag.
43004049	Ari ibagma ap suwon ibam foroho latfag ahun inowen, "Nowe, namloho war am hag tehen lul," ibag.
43004050	Ibagma Yesusen, "Hamloho ari fano atmisiyen we hibam lamihin," ibag. Yesusen ibag ane fahet ap inowen indimu tem ehek ulug wenggel hibareg libag.
43004051	Ap ino kema larukmen amingmingangge salkal ibareg, "Malik ino fano aha," ulug hiyag itfag.
43004052	Hiyag itfagma ap inowen amingmingangge kapal isaruk lit, "Mo kiya weregma fano aha?" ulug kapal isibagma iren onowe fam hiyag utuk lit, "O sono mo anum pulmu weregma ubam inahan werehon eleg atisi," ulug hiyag itfag.
43004053	Hiyag itfagma ikni ino indimuwen ita liyim Yesusen malik fano atmisi irisiyon fam fano atisi pibag. Ari pibareg at men uhe malik menen Yesus fam wenggel haruk latfag.
43004054	O Yudea embeselug o Galilea libareg Yesusen poholmonen turuk ane aru inggik pirenehon tibag.
43005001	Welatfareg Yahudi inaben Allah wel tul ulug o Yerusalem palu arik laruk latfag sambil ino Yesus oho o Yerusalem libag.
43005002	Yerusalem elehet oko kilabehon fam sok humon unuk te "Domba" welatfag. Sok ino iraham ik sene misig yenggeleg latfag. Ik ari Ibrani inap enele roho Betesda suwaleg latfag. Ik ino ayegma o fuwaben ungga eneg saloho wirigmu
43005003	ap ouk warukon anggolo men inil siyahon men unuyug siyahon men inine elehon anggolo men o itano fam yinggig lit wereg latfag. It arimanowen ik il lebe rimisi ano ulug kilaboho lit welatfag.
43005004	Hup misihim-misihim malaikat Allahn monde ferukmu ik ino il kilil-kalal isaruk latfagma ap atam hik toho wambibag ahun ino fano atuk latfag. Ouk ekeyon-ekeyon ubam wereg angge famen fano atug laruk latfag.
43005005	O ino fam ap misig ouk waruk lit yinggigmen mo ilig am wirig am turukmen teng misig nubam hilag nanggoloben (tiga puluh delapan) atfagma welatfag.
43005006	Ap aru indam angge ouk waruk lit wereg ulug Yesus undaman tam Oluk atfareg ap ino fam, "Nare, hat hundaman fano ale peruk lahen?" ulug kapal hibag.
43005007	Kapal hibagma ap inowen Yesus fam ele uruk lit, "Nowe, ik il ket lebe ririkim itano wambele angge famen ap let naptukon elehen ik horogma lalug wambimin peruk angge famen it winon tam wamburukon fano atug laruk," ibag.
43005008	Ibagma Yesusen ap ino fam, "In amin, halit heniye hilalug lamihin," ibag.
43005009	Yesusen ari ibagma ap ino fano atfareg heniye hilibareg libag. Yesusen ari tibag sambil aru Yahudi inap wene uruk sul hari Sabat ino tibag.
43005010	Wene uruk sambil welatfagma Yahudi inaben ap fano atfahon ino fam, "Wene uruk sambil halit heniye wehenon haren tuk fug ane tehen," ibag.
43005011	Ibagma ap inowen, "An hihit nabehek ahun inowen heniye hilamihinteg lamihin ehekma laruk lahi," ibag.
43005012	Ari ibagma iren ap ino kapal haruk lit, "Ap san halit heniyeyet hilalug lamihin ulug hiyag herehek?" ulug umung hibag.
43005013	Umung hibagma fano atfag ahun inowen ebe hiyag isamin ulug turukmen Yesus ap anggolo arimano sehelimuwen longgo ibagma Unuk napeleg ulug imbisibag.
43005014	Tot welatfareg wene uruk ibam Yesus men ap ino men ambi atfareg itano Yesusen, "Hat hihit habihiyon ariyen fano ahenma fobik mondabi siyahon hubam aruhu rohon siyag ane eke tuhun fug," ibag.
43005015	Yesusen ari ibagma ap ino wilip atfareg Yahudi inap unubam, "An hihit nabehek ahun ino Yesus inowen hihit nabehek," ulug hiyag isibag.
43005016	Ari hiyag isibagma Yahudi inap arimanowen o wene uruk sambil tuk fug ane tehekma wabuhuk ulug mutug laruk latfag.
43005017	Ari turuk latfag angge famen Yesusen hiyag isaruk lit, "Nikniyen yabuk indam angge turukmen ketiya oho turuk. Ari fahet Anden oho turuk lahi," ibag.
43005018	Ari ibagma Yahudi inaben hol hibareg inindi inahan anggolo hibareg pinggi wabuhuk ulug wenggeltuk latfag. Atam oho wene uruk sambil saliyohap tehekteg fobik oho Allah An Nikni uruk lit Allah men ambi reg lahi ulug wirim tehekma wabuhuk pibag.
43005019	Yesusen hiyag isaruk lit, "Amloho amu yabuk wibuk fug tehen Ikniyen witukmu yet halug Amlohowen oho wibuk hag teg ulug tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi. Ikniyen turukon ari hag toho Amlohowen oho tuk teg lit wereg.
43005020	Ikniyen Amloho Indi reg lit mun ane man ane Inggarehen wituk ane Amloho hiyag Utuk lit yabuk suwon eke sebe roho hiyag Uruhumu hiren henekolen yihi uruk lamuhup.
43005021	Ikniyen ap warehon unduhuk felug onolukap eneptuk hag toho Amlohowen oho Inggareg indimuwen timin puhuwon arimano onolukap enebuhu.
43005022	Ikniyen unggum angginon Amu kong tuk fug anggeyen unggum obog toho Namlohowen kong tukag ulug hiyag Itisi.
43005023	Ap obog toho Ikni wel turuk hag toho Amloho wel turuk lamuhup. Ap san Amloho wel turuk eleg halug at inowen Ikni monde ferisiyon ino oho wel tuhu fug," ibag.
43005024	"Ap san An nawene holtuk lit An mon Naptisiyon Ubam indi wenggel haruk halug at ino war atuk ambeg embeselug mondabi onoluk wereg ambeg weregma unggum angginon ubam aruhu fug ulug ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
43005025	Ap war atuson arimanowen Allah amloho Ele holuhup. Holuhubon arimano onoluk welamuhup. Ihi ane ari fobik teko lahuwon ketiya oho teko laruk, ari we tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
43005026	Ikniyen ap onolukap eneptuk hag toho Amlohowen oho ap onolukap enebukag ulug Ikniyen Amloho ineyap tibag.
43005027	Amloho ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino wambik watfagma unggum kong tukag ulug Ikniyen ineyap tibag.
43005028	Ap war atusama sal eneptuson arimanowen At ele holuhupmu fano ane turuk latfahon arimano in enebuhumu mondabi onoluk welamuhup, siyag ane turuk latfahon arimano in enebuhureg unggum angginon unubam umbuhu. Ari tuhu ane teko laruk halug hiren yihi uk fug."
43005030	"An ninggareg nindiyen nungge-nungge tuk fug teg lahi. An Nikniyen hiyag Nutukmu holtuk lahiyon hikit toho unggum kong turuk lahi. An namu nindiyen unggum kong turuk lahi fug, Nikni mon Naptisiyon inowen hiyag Nutukon hikit toho eneg kong turuk lahimu wirim toho teko laruk.
43005031	An namuwen turuk lahiyon ari fahet fano ulug Ninggarehen wel ta fug teg lahi.
43005032	Ap winonen Anden turuk lahi ane fahet fano ulug fag toho uruk isalug ari tem toho uruk.
43005033	Hiren Yohanes ambeg ap mon eneptikipmu aren An nubahet tem toho peruk ane fahet honolukap heneptisi.
43005034	Ap kinangmonen An fahet uruk ane Anden fano peruk lahi fug, hit mondabi fano amag ulug Anden ari hiyag hisaruk lahi.
43005035	Yohanes ino iral hunduhuk felug umbagpag turukon hag toho welatisimu hiren seleg ari fano ulug henehiyeg toho welatikip angge famen tot welatug embeserikip.
43005036	Yohanes inowen An niyarisi ane fahet irisiyon ari fano famen apma reg. Nikniyen yabuk wituk laruhun ulug wanggun Ninggikmu emberisimu wituk lahi ane ari palimu reg. Wituk lahi ane ariyen Nikniyen An mon Naptisi ane ari fag atisi.
43005037	Nikni An mon Naptisiyon inowen An namloho tu ulug An fahet fag toho hiyag isaruk. An Nikniyen mon Naptisi angge famen hiren An nubam wenggel haruk lahep fug ane ariyen Nikni ele holuk fug angge Ebe hinilen ha fug angge Awene hunundama emberuk lahep fug.
43005039	Suwesingga indam haharoho imbibahon fam mondabi nonoluk welamuhuk ulug hiren yami ruruk lahep. Suwesingga haharoho imbibahon inowen An inamap Naptuk.
43005040	Inamap Naptuk angge famen mondabi nonoluk welamuhuk ulug Nambeg waharuk lahep fug."
43005041	"Ap kinangmonen wel Naptukon fahet fano peruk lahi fug.
43005042	Hiren Allah fahet hinindi reg lahep fuhon ari An noluk.
43005043	An waharikikon Nikni unuk famen waharikik angge famen hiren An fahet fano peruk lahep fug. Ap eke inggareg unuk famen waruhuwon ino fahet hiren fano peruk lamuhup.
43005044	Nonoriyen nit wel nenebukag ulug turuk lahep angge famen Allah we misig werehon inowen nit wel nenebuhu ulug yami ruruk lahep fug. Nangginoho Allah fam hinindi wenggel hehep ha reg?
43005045	Anden hit fahet iren siyag ane turuk ulug Nikni ambeg huruwe laruk puk fug. Hiren nunumba Musan fanowap nenebuhu peruk lahep angge famen ariyen huruwe laruk.
43005046	Musan An fahet haharoho imbibagma hiren Musan hahatfahon tem toho ulug wenggel helepma An faher oho tem toho pelep.
43005047	Musan haharoho imbibahon fahet hinindimu wenggeltuk lahep fugmu Anden hiyag hisaruk lahiyon oho nangginoho honoluk am teg," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
43006001	Welatfareg Yesus ik Galilea ahum keyen ik fimag nindig atfag. Ik ino unuk eke Tiberias.
43006002	Nindig atfagma ap anggolo arimanowen Yesusen ap ouk warukon hihir eneptukmu hibareg Ombolim miyaloho mutug laruk latfag.
43006003	Laruk latfagma Yesus otsi men punu fam lahibareg heriyeg latfag.
43006004	Heriyeg latfag sambil ari Yahudi inap suburu roti sig elehon naruk sul Paskah horog teg latfag.
43006005	Welatfareg Yesusen yer isarukmen ap anggolo miyaloho waharukmu yer isibareg Filipus fam kapal haruk lit, "O kema suburu ayeg waroho wak lulteg ap aruma og usulmu nalusa?" ulug kapal hibag.
43006006	Kapal hibag ane ari Yesus undaman ari timin pibareg Filipus wal hamin ulug kapal hibag.
43006007	Kapal hibagma Filipus inowen Yesus fam, "Nowe, uang inggila suwon teng-teng angge foroho lalareg hahen suburu onggo paloho wak lilaman oho kut-kut nelep angge famen wirim alep fug," ibag.
43006008	Ari ibagma Yesus ot Simon Petrus are Andreas inowen Yesus hiyag Utuk lit,
43006009	"Tuma malik misihen suburu roti fuwaben men ikan piren men foroho angge famen ap anggolo aruma werehen nangginoho tehe ha reg?" ibag.
43006010	Ari ibagma Yesusen otsi unubam, "Ap aruma fam hur amiyek ilihip," ibag. It welatfag ambeg ari hoholangge anggolo weregma ap arimano hur atfag. Hur atfahon arimano ap eneg teng-teng angge winahuk fug toho (lima ribu orang laki-laki) welatfag.
43006011	Hur atfagma Yesusen suburu itano wibareg seneg lit sembahyang ibareg ap arimano fibir eneptuk latfag. Suburu og isibareg ikan oho nin eke nila peruk latfahon og isaruk latfag.
43006012	Nibareg enehum ouk atfagma Yesusen otsi fam Ele uruk lit, "Nenggesareg embeheson aruma hik isahup tohon palu roho embelihip," ibag.
43006013	Ibagma ap anggolo arimanowen roti fuwaben itano nibareg minggir atfahon Yesus otsiyen sum nisanggowen fam fani roho imbibag.
43006014	Ap kinangmonen turuk eleg ane Yesusen tibag ane fahet ap anggolo arimanowen yet hibareg, "At tu Allahn kinangma monde fuhu ibahon nabi ino At tu tem toho," uruk latfag.
43006015	Ap anggolo arimanowen Yesus ninine roho hondohokukteg ap suwonap tuhuk ulug pibag ane ari Yesus oluk atfareg punu eke fam Yesus amumu libag.
43006016	O hup arik ohoma Yesus otsi ik ayegma libareg
43006017	kou fam kibareg o Kapernaum lul ulug ik ahum ke laruk latfag. Larukmen o hik atfag angge famen Yesus it enembeg waharuk elegma
43006018	siyelu humon watfareg ik haglabut waharuk latfag.
43006019	E fam ik il watil larukmen tot yat toho (lima kilometer) libareg yet harukmen Yesus ik ahum pali keyen kou horogma lamin ulug waharukmu yet hibag. Yet hibareg iren enekolen turuk latfag.
43006020	Enekolen turuk latfagma Yesusen te, "An Honowe waharuk lahireg henekol ha fug," ibag.
43006021	Ari ibagma iren Onowe fam kou fam kik ma ul ulug turukmen kou ino it lul pibag ambeg itano ik ayegma welatfag.
43006022	Likiyamon ap anggolo ik fimag fil welatfag inap arimanowen yet harukmen kou winon elegma kou misig eneg welatisiyon ino fam Yesus kuk fugmen Otsi eneg larusa ulug yet hibag.
43006023	Yet hibareg weregma kou piren hinahan o Tiberias filen watfareg Yesusen sembahyang ibareg suburu og isibag ambeg itano horogma watfag.
43006024	Horogma watfagma ap anggolo arimanowen yet harukmu Yesus otsi men eleg latfagma kou itano fam kibareg Yesus yami rul ulug o Kapernaum fil laruk latfag.
43006025	Ap arimano ik fimag libareg Yesus hiyag Itfareg, "Nonowe, nungge salim tuma waharikin?" ulug kapal hibag.
43006026	Kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Hit hinindi anggar amag ulug Anden eneg ane tirikikon ino fam wenggel ha fug angge we suburu nenehum ouk toho nengge ulug yami Nabil waharuk lahep. Ari fahet tem toho hunubam uruk lahi," ibag.
43006027	"Suburu filik turukon ari fahet yabuk wituk lamuhup fug. Suburu narukmu mondabi honoluk welamuhubon ari fahet yabuk wituk lamuhup. Suburu fanowon ari At ap atik ibahon inowen og hisahu. Ninikni Allah inowen Namloho ulug At ubam eneg ane teberisi," ibag.
43006028	Ari ibagma iren te, "Allahn fano peruk iyabuk wituk lamuhuken nanggintul," ulug kapal hibag.
43006029	Kapal hibagma Yesusen te, "Allahn fano peruk iyabuk aru: Aren monde ferisiyon ino Ubam hinindi wenggel haruk lamek," ibag.
43006030	Ari ibagma iren te, "Eneg ane Haren timihinon yet hulteg ninindimuwen tem toho pulen nungge ane fam wal hamihin? Yabuk nunggeyon timihin?
43006031	Nit niniknisi nunumbusagsi suburu eleg angge farema wereg lit suburu manna nibag ane fahet haharoho werehon te Allahn poholman suburu og isibag ulug hahareg lit wereg," ibag.
43006032	Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Hahareg lit wereg ehebon ari fahet Anden tot hiyag hisamin: Hun Musa inowen suburu poholmon og hisibag fug. An Nikniyen suburu poholmon we tem toho fanowon ketiya og hisaruk.
43006033	Ap kinangmon onoluk welamag ulug suburu Allahn tohon Aren poholman pilabik waharuk," ibag.
43006034	Ari ibagma iren te, "Nonowe, suburu ehenon ari likiya hupmu og nisaruk laruhun," ibag.
43006035	Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Suburu mondabi oluk werehon ino An tu welahi. Ap sa An nambeg waharukon mondabi suburu obok hahu fug, san An nubam indi wenggel harukon mondabi ik obok hahu fug," ibag.
43006036	"Hit hinilen An yet Niyaruk lahep angge famen Nubam wenggel haruk lahep fug ulug hit hunubam fahe hiyag hisihi.
43006037	An Nikniyen og Nutukon obog toho An nambeg waharuk. Ap sa An nambeg waharukon miyaloho hik isahuk fug.
43006038	An poholman wambik waharikikon An namu nindiyen yabuk wiruhuk ulug wambik waharikik fug. Nikni An mon Naptisiyon inowen yabuk hiyag Nuruhuwon wiruhuk ulug wambik waharikik.
43006039	Mon Naptisiyon inowen yabuk hiyag Nitisiyon aru re: Obog toho Aren og Nitisiyon arimano foroho lit misig oho longgo rubuk fug angge weregma fobik aruhu sambil ino onolukap enebuhun ulug hiyag Nitisi," ibag.
43006040	"Ap san Amloho yet halug Ubam indi wenggel haruk halug at ino mondabi oluk welaruhuwen fobik aruhu sambil ino olukap tuhuk. Aru Nikni undama perisiyon fam hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.
43006041	Yesusen ari ibagma Yahudi inaben Yesus pet turuk lit, "Suburu poholman wambik watfahon ino An ehek," ulug Abug uruk latfag.
43006042	"Yesus Yusuf amloho ikni isinga niren isaruk laheyon At aru fug? Nangginoho ap tuwen poholman wambik waharikik uk hag teg?" uruk latfag.
43006043	Ari uruk latfagma Yesusen, "An pet Naptuk lit Nabug uk fug.
43006044	Ap san An nambeg watnin perukon ino Nikni mon Naptisiyon inowen hondoholug waharuk halug eneg An nambeg wam hag teg. Ap ino fobik waruhu sambil Anden olukap tuhuk.
43006045	Atam haharoho imbibag ane ari ap obog toho Allah inggarehen hiyag isahu ulug ap nabi arimanowen haharoho imbibag. Ap sa Allah inggarehen hiyag isarukon holtuk halug Nambeg waharuk.
43006046	Ap kinangmonen Nikni ebe haruson eke wereg eleg. We Allah wereg ambehen waharisiyon inowen eneg Ikni ebe harisi.
43006047	An nubam indi wenggel harukon at ino mondabi oluk welaruhu. Ari we tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
43006048	Suburu mondabi oluk werehon An tu welahi.
43006049	Hit hiniknisi unumbusagsiyen farema wereg lit suburu manna naruk latfag angge famen war atuk latfag.
43006050	Suburu poholman wambik waharisiyon ino at tu: Ap san suburu aru naruk halug at ino war aruhu fug.
43006051	Suburu olukon poholman waharisiyon ino An tu welahi. Ap san suburu aru naruk halug at ino mondabi oluk welaruhu. Ap kinangmon onoluk welamuhuben suburu Anden og isaruk lahiyon aru Nunu og isaruk lahi," ibag.
43006052	Ari ibagma Yahudi inaben it-it suwahal uruk lit, "Ap tuwen Inggareg unu nangginoho nit og nisarukmu naruk lahe," ibag.
43006053	Ari ibagma Yesusen, "At ap atik ibahon ino Unu men Amep men nahup fugmu hit hinindimu olukon welaruhu fug. Ari tem toho hunubam uruk lahi.
43006054	Ap san An nunu men An namep men naruk halug at ino mondabi oluk weregma fobik waruhu sambil Anden olukap tuhuk.
43006055	An nunu men Namep men aru we tem toho naruk angge fanowon wereg.
43006056	Ap san An nunu men Namep men naruk halug at ino An men welaruhumu An at men mangno roho welamuhuk.
43006057	Nikni oluk werehon inowen An mon Naptisimu An oho At fam Noluk welahi hag toho ap san An nunu naruk halug at ino oho An fam oluk welaruhu.
43006058	Suburu poholman wambik waharisiyon tuma wereg. Hinikni hunumban suburu naruk latfag angge famen war atfahon ino hag toho fug, ap san suburu werehon tu naruk halug mondabi oluk welaruhu," ibag.
43006059	Yesusen hiyag isibag ane obog toho aru o Kapernaum wene uruk ibamen hiyag isibag.
43006060	Yesusen hiyag isibag ane ari obog toho holfareg Otsi anggolo arimano it winonen te, "Ele haro roho ehekon ari san holuk teg ane ehek?" uruk latfag.
43006061	Yesus otsiyen ninirim ulug ngesukum tibag ane fahet Yesus undaman oluk atfagma Ele unubam uruk lit, "Hiyag hisihi ane fahet hinindi nin aha?
43006062	At ap atik ibahon ino atam welatfag ambeg suhuloho laharukmu yet hahup halug nanggintuk lamuhup?
43006063	Allah hime fanowon inowen onolukap enebuk teg, unu amuwen tuk fug teg. Anden nele hiyag hisaruk lahiyon ari fam Allah hime fanowon werehen honoluk welamuhup ane fahet hiyag hisaruk lahi.
43006064	Hit welahebon aruma winonen te tem toho uruk ulug hinindi wenggel haruk lahep fug," ibag. Yesusen wene ak tibibag sambilen ap inindimu tem toho hiyag nisaruk peruk latfag fug inap arimano fahet Indimu oluk atfag. Wabukag ulug huruwe lahuk peruk latfag ahun ino oho Yesus indimu oluk atfag.
43006065	Oluk atfagma Yesusen it unubam te, "Hiren ari roho peruk lahepma fahe hiyag hisihi ane ari fahet ihi: Nikniyen hiyag hisaruk eleg halug ap misig oho An nambeg wam fug teg," ibag.
43006066	Wene ari hiyag isibag sambil ino famen Yesus otsi anggolo arimano At min laruk ane inirim atfagma pok atfag.
43006067	Pok atfagma Yesusen otsi nisanggowen itano fam, "Hir oho pok amul peruk lahep?" ulug kapal isibag.
43006068	Kapal isibagma Simon Petrus inowen hebeloho, "Nonowe, ap sa ambeg nit laruk lamul? Wene Haren uruk lahenon ari famen mondabi nonoluk welamuhuk.
43006069	Hat Allahn palimuwap Haptisiyon welahenon niren Hat fahet tem toho peruk lit nonoluk toho welahe," ibag.
43006070	Ari ibagma Yesusen te, "Anden hit nisanggowen welahebon aruma mumal heneptikik fug? Ari reg angge famen hit welahebon aruma misig eke siyahon Iblis amloho wereg," ibag.
43006071	Ibag ane ari Simon Iskariot amloho Yudas ino fahet ibag. At inowen Yesus wabukag ulug huruwe libag ahun ino it nisanggowen itano enesehelimu misig welatfag.
43007001	Yahudi inaben Yesus wabuhuk peruk latfagma o Yudea eneg mondabi welaruhuk fug ulug Galilea walingguruk latfag.
43007002	Walingguruk latfagma Yahudi inaben o sabo inggilangge fam wituk sambil ino sali horog teg latfagma
43007003	Yesus oriyen Ubam enele uruk lit, "Hat hotsiyen Haren turuk ane yet hahuben tuman o Yudea lamihin," ulug hiyag Utuk lit,
43007004	"Ap misihen turuk lahi ane inam alep peruk halug hirahoman tuk fug teg. Haren turuk lahen ane ari ap obohen onoluk amag ulug Hinggareg hebe unug isahun," ibag.
43007005	Enele ari roho ibahon Yesus ori ininggarehen Ubam wenggel ha fug anggeyen ibag.
43007006	Ibagma Yesusen hebeloho hiyag isaruk lit, "Anden tuhuk sambil uwan lahi, hiren eneg henesehet toho likiya hupmu turuk lahep.
43007007	Ap kinangmon ininggarehen siyag ane turukon fahet fag toho hiyag isaruk lahimu iren An nubahet eneg ninirim peruk lit hit fahet ninirim peruk eleg.
43007008	Seni esetuk ambeg hit henemu lalihip, An tuhuk ane uwan tehen An la fug teg lahi," ibag.
43007009	Yesusen ari ulug Ori fam hiyag isibareg o Galilea welatfag.
43007010	Yesus ori arimano o Yudea seni esetuk ambeg libagma Ar oho inam toho la fug angge hirag-hirag onombolim libag.
43007011	Yahudi inap arimanowen seni esetuk ambehen At ino kema wereg ulug yami ruruk latfag.
43007012	At fahet enele anggolo roho eke hag eke hag uruk lit it winonen At fano ahun urukmu it winonen At siyag ahun, Aren ap inindi ninap eneptuk uruk latfag.
43007013	Yahudi inap onowesi arimano fahet enekolen misihen oho ambong se roho ele seleg toho uk fug teg latfag.
43007014	Yahudi inaben o sabo inggila fam witfareg nohorukmen hup hinahanam atfagma Yesus Allah ibam kibareg wene hiyag isaruk latfag.
43007015	Hiyag isarukmu hibareg Yahudi inaben, "Ap suwonen milaltusa fug angge famen hun tu Oluk teg lit nangginoho hiyag nisaruk?" uruk latfag.
43007016	Uruk latfagma Yesusen, "Anden hiyag hisaruk lahi ane aru Ninggareg nindimu wenggel halug hiyag hisaruk lahi fug. An mon Naptisiyon inowen hiyag Nitisimu uruk lahi," ibag.
43007017	"Allah wene uruk lahi ano, An ninggareg nindimuwen wenggel halug uruk lahi ano, mon Naptisiyon inowen peruk ane hikit toho turuk ahun ino eneg indi anggar aruhu.
43007018	Ap san inggareg indimu wenggel haruk ane hiyag isaruk ahun ino ap winonen yet niyalug wel nabukag ulug hiyag isaruk. Ap san monde ferisiyon ino eneg wel turuk lamag peruk ahun inowen ele si uk fug angge tem toho hiyag isaruk.
43007019	Ari roho tuk fug ulug Musan haharoho hit fam imbibag fug? Imbibag angge famen hit obog tohowen apmayap tebeseruk lit nungge fahet An nuwabuhuk peruk lahep?" ibag.
43007020	Ibag ane fahet ap anggolo arimanowen kapal haruk lit, "Siyag angge Hindimu werehen uruk hag toho ehenon ari ap san huwaruhu ane fahet ehen?" ibag.
43007021	Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Anden alem we misig tirikik ane fahet hiren yihi uruk lahep.
43007022	Hiren te enembilahap paltuk ane ari Musan imbibag uruk lahep angge famen aren imbibag fug, hit hiniknisi unumbusagsiyen imbibag. Enembilahap paltuk ane ari wene uruk sambilen oho paluk teg uruk lahep.
43007023	Musa awene apmayap tul fug ulug wene uruk sambilen enembilahap paltuk lahep anggeyen Anden wene uruk sambil ap ouk warukon fanowap tirikikon fahet pet Naptuk lahep?
43007024	Nori, hiren unggum kong turuk lit sel fil werehon yet halug kong turuk lamuhup fug, fano pikit toho eneg kong turuk lamuhup," ibag.
43007025	Welatfagma Yerusalem inap arimano winonen te, "Wabuhuk uruson ino hun tu fahet uruk ano?" ulug umung-umung atuk lit,
43007026	"Yet hemek, At inowen fag toho hiyag isarukmu iren hebeloho At ubam tot uruk eleg. Nit niniknisi arimanowen At Kristus ap obog toho fanowap enebik waruhu urukon ino ulug onoluk teg ano?
43007027	Ap tu ibam yugmu nit nonoluk teg lahe. Kristus waruhu uruson ino waharuk halug At ibam yugmu ap misihen oho oluk teg lam fug teg," ari ulug enele sahaltuk latfag.
43007028	Yesusen Allah ibamen Ele hi roho hiyag isaruk lit, "An niyaruk lahebon Nibam yugmu oho honoluk teg lahep angge famen An namu nindiyen waharikik fug, tem toho uruk Ahun ino hiren haruk lahep fuhon ariyen An mon Naptisi.
43007029	Aren An mon Naptisimu At wereg ambehen waharikikon inowen At fahet Noluk teg lahi," ibag.
43007030	Ari ibagma it arimanowen senebul pibag angge famen Allahn teko lahu ibahon sali hikir atuk elehen ap misihen oho senebuk fug teg latfag.
43007031	It ap anggolo welatfahon arimano fimag filen Aren urukon tem toho uruk ulug wenggel haruk latfag. "Kristus fobik waruhu uruson ino waruhu halug Aren ap fanowap eneptuk ane anggolo tuhu, At tuwen tor angge tirisi peruk lahep?" ulug it-it enele sahaltuk latfag.
43007032	Ap anggolo arimanowen enele sahaltukmu Farisi inaben hol isibareg Farisi inap men imam inap onowesi suwon arimano menen senerik lalihip ulug enemingmingangge mon enepfag.
43007033	Mon enepfagma Yesusen, "We tot hit men ambiyeg welaruhukteg An mon Naptisiyon ino Ambeg lahuk," ibag.
43007034	"An welaruhuk ambeg hit wam fug tehen An yami Nabuhup angge famen hiyag Nabuhup fug," ibag.
43007035	Ibagma Yahudi inaben it-it enele sahaltuk lit, "Hiyag Nabuhup fug ehekon ari kema lahumu hahuk fuhon fahet ehek," ibag. "Yunani inap wereg ambeg enesehelimu linggik-longgo uruson enembeg lahukteg Yunani inap hiyag isahuk ulug uruk ano?" ibag.
43007036	"Yami Nabil laruk lamuhup angge famen hiyag Nabuhup fug ehekon ari men An wereg ambeg hit wam fug teg ehekon ari men nungge fahet ehek?" ulug it-it enele sahaltuk latfag.
43007037	O sabo e inggila fam wituk latfahon ino obog-obogma turuk lit su ane tul pibag sambil ino Yesus in atfareg Ele hi roho hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap sa ik obok harukon An nambeg ik hinanggik wamag.
43007038	Ap sa indam haharoho imbibahon ino hikit toho An nubam wenggel harukon ino famen ik eleruk mondabi oluk welaruhu ahik wilip aruhu," ibag.
43007039	Ibag ane ari Allah hime fanowon ino ap At ubam inindi wenggel harukon arimano Allahn og isahu ulug hiyag isibag. Allahn Yesus unuk palimuwap tuk fugmu Allah hime fanowon ino ap unubam uwan wambik watfag fug.
43007040	Ap anggolo arimano winonen ibag ane hol hibareg, "Wene hiyag isaruk ahun nabi waruhu uruk latuson ino tu tem toho waharisi," uruk latfag.
43007041	It winonen te, "Mesias waruhu uruk latuson ino tu," uruk latfag. It winonen te, "A, Mesias waruhu uruson ino o Galilean wam fug teg.
43007042	Atam haharoho imbibahon te Mesias ino Dauren ondohowonen ondohowon o Betlehem Daud welatfag ambehen waruhu," uruk latfag.
43007043	Uruk latfagma ap anggolo arimanowen At fahet it-it suwahal uruk latfag.
43007044	Ap arimano fumag filonen Yesus senebul ulug tibag angge famen ap eke ambong se roho At senetukon elehen imbisibag.
43007045	At senetukon eleg latfagma enemingmingangge itano suhuloho imam onowesi suwon men Farisi inap men enembeg libagma, "Nungge fahet At walug wahep fug?" ibagma
43007046	iren te, "At tuwen Ele uruk hag toho ap kinangmon misihen oho uruk latfag fug," ibag.
43007047	Ari ibagma Farisi inaben hebeloho it unubam te, "Hir oho hinindi ninap henebehek?
43007048	Ap suwon men Farisi inap men arimano misihen oho At fahet tem toho uruk ulug Ubam wenggel haruk?
43007049	We ap anggolo olma werehon Musa wene enepelehon arimanowen eneg At ubam wenggel haruk. It ap aruma war amag tohon," ibag.
43007050	Ari ibagma it arimano misig unuk Nikodemus atam Yesus ambeg watfahon inowen it unubam ele uruk lit,
43007051	"Musa wene fam ibahon hikit toho unggum kong turuk halug ap inowen turuk ane enepelegma kapal ha fug anggeyen unggum kong tuk teg?" ulug kapal isibag.
43007052	Kapal isibagma it arimanowen Nikodemus fam te, "Har oho Galilea hahun wereg lit uruk lahen? O Galilea inowen ap wene hiyag isarukon nabi misig wilip atfag fugmu suwesingga haharoho imbibahon kim hahunmu ari holuk aruhu," ulug ubam ibag.
43007053	Ari ibagma ap arimano inibam wal taneg libagma.
43008001	Yesus ino Zaitun punumu libag.
43008002	Likiyanet Yesus Allah ibam libareg weregma ap anggolo arimano Ambeg watfagma it sehelimu hur atfareg wene hiyag isaruk latfag.
43008003	Hiyag isarukmen Musa wene onoluk inap men Farisi inap menen hiyap siyag ane tibag hiyap eke senetfareg Yesus ambeg hondoholug watfag. Hondoholug watfareg it sehelimu unduhuk fibareg
43008004	Yesus fam hiyag Utuk lit, "Nonowe, hiyap aru siyag ane turukmu senerehereg walug waharuk lahe.
43008005	Hiyap siyag ane turukon halug helep fam watuk lamuhup ulug Musan haharoho imbibag. Haharoho imbibag angge famen Haren nungge peruk lahen?" ulug kapal hibag.
43008006	Ibag ane ari Aren imisi ane hol hulteg siyag ane uruk halug unggum Ubam umbuhuk ulug wal haruk lit ibag. Ubam ari ibag angge famen Yesus kinangma hur atfareg kunuk toho wereg lit Inggik tumen kinangma hahatuk latfag.
43008007	Hahatuk latfagma iren enele ine roho kapal haruk eneg latfagma Yesus in atfareg unubam Ele uruk lit, "Ap san siyag ane tirisi fuhon wereg halug aren tam helep wamisireg hiyap aru watmisi," ibag.
43008008	Ari ulug hiyag isibareg nin eke kunuk toho heriyeg lit Inggik tumen kinangma hahatuk latfag.
43008009	Yesusen ibag ane aru hol hibareg ap arimano hiyap siyag ane tibahon ino wabul pibag angge famen embeselug onowesi misig-misig wilip atukmu onotsi oho onombolim libagma Yesus weregma hiyap ino amu eneg welatfag.
43008010	Amu eneg welatfagma Yesus in atfareg hiyap ino fam kapal haruk lit, "Hat huwabul ulug hondog haplug wahason arimano kema lahasa? Misihen oho huwarehesa fug?" ulug kapal hibagma
43008011	hiyap inowen, "Nowe, misig oho wereg eleg," ibag. Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Iren oho hubam enele ehesa fug halug Anden oho Nele hubam imin fuhen lamihin. Hibam lamihinteg yoho tu famen fobik oho siyag ane eke tuhun fug," ibag.
43008012	Yesusen ap anggolo arimano nin Ele hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap kinangmon fahet iral umbagpag turukon An welahi. Ap sa An nombolim larukon ino hik teg ambeg la fug angge seleg mondabi oluk welaruhuwon ubam aruhu," ibag.
43008013	Ari ibagma Farisi inaben Yesus fam, "Hat hinggareg fahet wel taruk lit uruk lahenma tem toho uruk lahen fug," ibagma
43008014	Yesusen it unubam te, "An waharikik ambeg men lahuk ambeg men Noluk tehen Ninggareg fahet uruk lahiyon tu tem toho uruk lahi. Hiren An waharikik ambeg men lahuk ambeg men henepeleg toho welahep.
43008015	Hiren unggum kong turuk lit ap kinangmonen wirimangge emberuk hag toho kong turuk lahep. Anden ap misig fam oho unggum ubam umbuk fug teg lahi.
43008016	An namu welam fug tehen An Nikni mon Naptisiyon ino Niraham weregma Anden unggum kong turuk lahiyon tem toho kong turuk lahi.
43008017	Hit hinikni hunumban haharoho imbibahon te ap pirenen ap misig fahet abug uruk halug fano teko la reg ulug hahatfag.
43008018	Anden uruk lahiyon Ninggareg fahet uruk lahi, Nikni An mon Naptisiyon inowen oho An nubahet uruk," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
43008019	Ari ulug hiyag isibagma it arimanowen Yesus fam, "Hat Hikni ino kema wereg?" ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen te, "An men Nikni men hit henepelehen Nisaruk lahep fug. An fahet honoluk teg lalep halug Nikni faher oho honoluk teg lalep," ibag.
43008020	Hiyag isaruk latfag ane ari Allah ibamen uang derma emberuk ambeg iraham wereg lit hiyag isibag. Teko lahu ane ino uwan horog teg elehen ap misihen oho At senebuk fug teg latfag.
43008021	Yesusen ap anggolo arimano hiyag isaruk lit, "An lahukteg longgo uhukmu hiren yami Naptuk lit siyag ane hunundama weregma war amuhup. An lahuk ambeg ari hit la fug teg," ibag.
43008022	Ari ibagma Yahudi inaben te, "An lahuk ambeg hit la fug teg ehekon ari Inggarehen wat tahuk ulug ehek ano?" ibag.
43008023	Ari ibagma Yesusen te, "Hit apma filen waharikibon, An pali filen waharikikon, hit kinang tu famen inam atikibon, An kinang tu famen inam atikik fuhon welahi.
43008024	Ari fahet Anden fahe siyag ane hunundama weregma war amuhup ulug hiyag hisihi. At ino An welahiyon fahet tem toho peruk lamuhup fugmu siyag ane hunundama weregma war amuhup," ibag.
43008025	Ari ibagma iren te, "Hat welahenon sa?" ulug kapal hibagma Yesusen te, "Anden we saplangge uruk lahi angge re nike ane eke nungge fahet hiyag hisamin?
43008026	Anden hit henebug anggolo uruk lit unggum kong tele angge famen At mon Naptisiyon inowen tem ane eneg hiyag Nutukmu Anden holtuk lit ap kinangmon hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.
43008027	Aren Ikni fahet ibag ane ari it inindi anggar atfag fugmu wenggel hibag fug.
43008028	Wenggel hibag fugmu Yesusen ele uruk lit, "At ap atik ibahon ino hiren lehoma unduhuk fuhupteg At ino An welahiyon fahet hinindi anggar aruhu. An namu nindiyen tuk fug teg angge famen Nikniyen hiyag Nutukon eneg uruk lahiyon aru fahet ino sambil eneg honoluk aruhu.
43008029	An mon Naptisiyon inowen fet Nasug lit wereg, we Aren fano perukon ino Anden likiya hupmu turuk lahi," ibag.
43008030	Yesusen obog toho ari hiyag isibagma ap anggolo At ubam inindi wenggel haruk latfag.
43008031	Yahudi inap At ubam inindi wenggel haruk latfahon arimano unubam Yesusen ele uruk lit, "Nawene apma mondabi welamuhupmu we tem toho An notsi amuhup.
43008032	An notsi amuhupteg tem toho peruk lamuhup. Hiren tem toho peruk lamuhup ane ariyen hininggik lol henebuhu," ibag.
43008033	Ari ibagma iren te, "Nit Abrahamen ondohowonen indag nenesug angge re ap misig oho ap enemingmingangge atukuk fug. Hininggik lol henebuhu ehen ane ari nangginoho ehen?" ulug kapal hibag.
43008034	Kapal hibagma Yesusen, "Ap sa siyag ane turuk halug at ino siyahon amingmingangge roho wereg, ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
43008035	Amingmingangge ino ikni ibam mondabi welaruhu fug, amloho eneg ikni ibam welaruhu.
43008036	Amloho inowen hininggik lol heneptuk halug eneg hir oho we tem hininggik lol amuhup," ibag.
43008037	"Hit Abraham umbusagsi welahebon An noluk. An nawene hinindimu elehen An nuwabuhuk ulug alem yami ruruk lahep.
43008038	An Nikniyen turukmu harikikon ari fahet Nele uruk lahi. Hiren oho hinikni fam holtikibon ari hikit toho turuk lahep," ibag.
43008039	Ari ibagma iren te, "Nit ninikni re Abraham wereg," il larikim Yesusen te, "Hit Abraham umalikisi welalepma Abrahamen tibag ane hikit toho hiren turuk lalep.
43008040	Anden tem ane eneg hiyag hisaruk latikik angge famen hiren An nuwabuhuk ulug alem yami ruruk lahep. Tem peruk ane ari Nikni Allahn hiyag Nutuk latisimu turuk latikik. Hiren yabuk wituk lahebon Abrahamen ak tibibahon wituk lahep fug.
43008041	Hinikni amu ahun ekeyen ak tibibahon hiren wituk lahep," ibag. Ari ibagma iren te, "Ap hiyap fahet ahiyeg toho turuk ahun famen indag atuk uwag fug. Ninikni we misig wereg, At ino Allah," ibag.
43008042	Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Allah Ninikni peruk lit halug hiren An faher oho hinindi Nasug lalep. Allah ambehen wilip atikikteg tuma waharikik. Namu nindiyen lamin perikikteg waharikik fug, Nikniyen mon Naptisimu waharikik," ibag.
43008043	"Anden hit hunubam Nele urukmu nungge fahet holtuk lahep fug? Nawene fahet hinindi anggar atuk elehen Nele holtuk lahep fug.
43008044	Ninikni uruk lahebon ari Iblis fahet uruk lahep. Hinikniyen fano perukon eneg hiren turuk lahep. At undaman tor angge oho tem toho fano wenggel ha fug angge fuki roho uk fug angge indam oho ap unusuruk lit welatfag. Enele si uruk ane alem foroho ahun at ino wereg lit ele si ane eneg uruk. Ele si urukon ari asum fam werehon hinanggoho og isaruk.
43008045	Anden tem ane hiyag hisaruk lahi angge famen hit hinindimuwen tem toho ulug Nubam wenggeltuk lahep fug.
43008046	Hit aruma sehelimu welahebon san An nabug uruk lit ap tuwen siyag ane tirisi ulug uk hag teg? Anden tem ane hiyag hisaruk lahi angge famen nungge fahet hit hinindimuwen tem toho An nubam wenggeltuk lahep fug?
43008047	Allah wereg ambehen waharukon inowen Allah wene fano holtuk. Hit aruma Allah wereg ambehen waharikip fureg Awene holtuk lahep fug," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
43008048	Yahudi inaben Yesus fam enele uruk lit, "Niren hat hubahet, 'Samaria hahun welahen, Hundama siyag angge wereg,' uruk laheyon tem toho uruk lahe fug?" ulug Yesus pet tibag.
43008049	Pet tibagma Yesusen te, "Siyag angge An nundama wereg elehen Nikni wel turuk lahi angge famen hiren An apmayap Naptuk lahep.
43008050	Anden ninggareg wel Nabukag peruk lahi fug. At misig werehon inowen unggum kong tuhuwen An fahet At wel tukag peruk lit wereg.
43008051	An nawene holtuk lit Nubam wenggeltuk ahun ino mondabi war am fug angge oluk eneg welaruhu. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.
43008052	Ari ibagma Yahudi inaben At ubam enele uruk lit, "Hat siyag angge Hundama werehon ketiya nit nonoluk. Abraham men Allah wene tam hiyag isaruk latfag inap nabi oho war atfag angge famen Haren hele uruk lit, 'Ap sa An nubam wenggel harukon mondabi war aruhu fug,' ehen.
43008053	Haren ari ehenma Abraham tam war atfag ahun ino toron, An suwon peruk lahen? Allahn indam mon enepfahon arimano tam war atfag angge famen Haren sa men wirimap taruk lahen?" ibag.
43008054	Ari ibagma Yesusen te, "Ninggareg fahet wel taruk lit elema hahen Nele si ane ele. An wel Naptukon Nikniyen wel Naptuk, At ino fahet hiren oho At Ninikni wereg uruk lahep.
43008055	Ari uruk lahep angge famen hiren At fahet henepeleg teg lahepma Anden eneg Noluk teg lahi. At fahet Napeleg teg lahi elema hiren henele si uruk lahep hag toho An oho Nele si uruk Nahun welale. Welale angge famen Anden At Noluk teg lit Ele holtuk lahi.
43008056	Hinikni Abraham ino fam, 'At inam aruhu sambil yet hahun,' ulug Allahn hiyag itfagma ahiyeg hibag. Ahiyeg hibareg welatfagma an inam atik iyag sambil ino yet niyibareg ahiyeg hibag," ulug hiyag isibag.
43008057	Ari ibagma Yahudi inaben Yesus ubam enele uruk lit, "Hat indag hapfag sambilen mo ilig am wirig am turukmu teng piren (lima puluh tahun) uwan angge famen haren Abraham harikin?" ibagma
43008058	Yesusen te, "Hun Abraham ino uwanma an tam welatik iyag, ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi," ibag.
43008059	Ari ibagma helep wibareg Yesus wabul ulug turukmen Yesus hirag atfareg o Allah ibam embeselug wilip atfag.
43009001	Yesus ke funggalma larukmen ap misig isinga ahummuwen il hupnig angge indag tibahon weregma yet hibag.
43009002	Yet hibareg Yesus otsiyen kapal haruk lit, "Nonowe, ap il hupnihon aru ap san siyag ane tirisi? Inggarehen ano ikni isingan siyag ane tibagma il hupnig angge indag tibag ano?" ulug kapal hibag.
43009003	Kapal hibagma Yesusen otsi unubam hiyag isaruk lit, "At inggareg men ikni isinga menen siyag ane turusama fug. Allahn yabuk fanowon witukmu aben yet hahuben il hupnig lit wereg," ibag.
43009004	"An mon Naptisiyon iyabuk ari o sakan tegma wituk lamuhuk, hup atukmu ap misihen oho yabuk wibuk fug teg.
43009005	Ketiya An kinangma welahiyon aru ap kinangmon fahet iral fanowon welahi," ibag.
43009006	Yesusen obog toho ari hiyag isibareg kinangma wasubag sup tibibareg kinang men mangno roho wiyihap tibibareg sabelep atfagma ap il hupnihon ino ilmu tag tibibag.
43009007	Tag tibibareg Ele hiyag utuk lit, "Lamihinteg ik Siloam sene yenggelehon ino fam hil umatmihin," ibag. Ik sene Siloam unuk ari nit nenele roho "Monde ferisiyon". Ari ibagma libareg ik ino fam il umatfagma il fenggen atfareg suhuloho watfag.
43009008	Watfagma ori men suburu ap fam heng eneptukmu hibahon arimano menen enele uruk lit, "Suburu ap fam heng eneptuk latisiyon ino tu fug ano," ulug enele sahaltuk latfag.
43009009	Enele sahaltuk lit ap ekeyen te, "At ino tu," urukmu it winonen te, "At ino fug, ap winon at hag toho waharuk," uruk latfagma at inggarehen, "Tem toho an ino," ibag.
43009010	Ari ibagma it arimanowen, "Nangginoho hil fenggen aha," ulug kapal hibag.
43009011	Kapal hibagma ap inowen, "Ap Yesus urukon inowen wasubag fam kinang sabelebap tebehekteg nilmu tag teberuk lit ik Siloam umarik lamihin ehekma lahireg umarihimu nil fenggen ahama yet ha reg lahi," ibag.
43009012	Ari ibagma iren at kapal haruk lit, "At ino kema laha?" ibagma, "An napeleg," ibag.
43009013	Aren napeleg ibagma it arimanowen ap il siyag latfahon ino Farisi inap weregma hondoholug libag.
43009014	Yesusen wasubag fam kinang sabelebap tibareg il fam tag tibibag sambil ino Yahudi inap wene uruk lit kel taruk sambil welatfag.
43009015	Ari fahet Farisi inap arimanowen te, "Hil nangginoho fenggen aha?" ulug kapal hibagma aren te, "Ap inowen an nilmu sabelep tag tebehekma nil ik umarik lahimu nil fano ahama yet haruk lahi," ibag.
43009016	Ari ibagma it Farisi inap winonen, "Ap ari wene uruk sambil hari Sabat tuk fug ane tehekma Allahn monde ferisiyon fug," ibagma it winonen te, "Fano ane Aren tehekon tu hahon ap siyag ane turuk ahun ekeyen nangginoho tuk teg," ulug it arimano enele sahaltuk lit suwahal uruk latfag.
43009017	Suwahal uruk lit ap il siyag latfahon ino fam, "Hil fanowap habehek ahun ino fahet haren nangginoho peruk lahen?" ibagma ap inowen te, "At ino Allahn monde ferisiyon nabi wereg," ibag.
43009018	Ari ibagma Yahudi inap onowesi arimanowen ap aru il siyag latisi angge famen il fenggen aha ulug tem toho peruk eleg lit ap ino ikni isinga wol enepfareg
43009019	unubam kapal isaruk lit, "Tu hit henemloho il siyag angge endetikibon ano? Hit henemloho halug ketiya nangginoho il fano ahama yet haruk?" ulug kapal isibag.
43009020	Kapal isibagma iren te, "Tu tem toho nit nenemloho il siyag angge indag atfag ane ari nit nonoluk famen
43009021	ketiya fano ahama yet haruk ane ari ap fanowap tehekon nit nenepeleg angge re at inggareg oho suwon tehen amu hiyag hisamisiyen inggareg kapal halihip," ibag.
43009022	Ibag ane ari ikni isinga menen Yahudi inap onowesi fahet enekolen ari ibag. Yahudi inap onowesi arimanowen ap san Yesus fahet Mesias tu ulug fag toho uruk halug at ino fam nenele yeng umbuhuk ulug Yahudi inap onowesi arimanowen tam oho ari peruk latfag.
43009023	Alem ari fahet wenggel hibareg ikni isingan, "Ar oho ebe suwon angge re inggareg amu kapal halihip," ibag.
43009024	Ari ibagma ap il siyag latfahon ino nin wol tibareg ubam enele uruk lit, "Ap ino siyag ane turukon nit nonoluk tehen ketiya Allah nit pilap nenesug lit weregma haren we tem fag toho hiyag nisimin," ibag.
43009025	Ari ibagma aren te, "Ap ino siyag ane turuk ahun ano, ari an napeleg. We fahe nil siyag laha angge famen nil fenggen ahama ketiya yet ha reg lahiyon ari eneg an noluk," ibag.
43009026	Ari ibagma ap arimanowen, "Ap inowen hubam nungge ane tehek? Nangginoho hil fenggen habehek?" ulug kapal hibagma
43009027	hun inowen, "Nori, fahe anden hiyag hisihimu holehep angge famen nin fobik nungge ane hiyag hisamin? Hir oho At otsi amuhuk peruk lit uruk lahep?" ibag.
43009028	Ibag ane ari fahet iren ap ino pet turuk lit, "Hat te At ino Ot welahen, nit te Musa umaliki welahe.
43009029	Musa fam Allahn hiyag itfahon ari nit nonoluk angge famen ap aru keman waharisiyon nit nenepeleg," ibag.
43009030	Ari ibagma ap inowen te, "Yihi nori, At inowen nil fanowap tehek angge famen hiren At keman waharisi ari nenepeleg uruk lahep?
43009031	Siyag ane turuk ahunen Allah fam heng turukmu holtuk eleg. Ap fano ane turuk lit Allahn peruk ane hikit toho turuk inap enele holtukon ari nit nonoluk.
43009032	Ap misig il hupnig angge indag tibahon il fenggenap turuk ahun misig wereg ulug indam oho ketiya oho holtukuk fug, ari nit nonoluk.
43009033	Ap ino Allah wereg ambehen walep fug halug ari hahon tuk fug teg lalep," ibag.
43009034	Ari ibagma iren te, "Hat aru we tem toho siyag ane turukon sehelimuwen indag hapfagma nangginoho it unubam hiyag isamin peruk lahen," ulug yanggaloho wili fisibag.
43009035	Yahudi inaben ap ino yanggaloho wili fesehesa urukon Yesusen hol hibareg fobik ap ino men ambi atfareg Yesusen at ino fam Ele uruk lit, "Ap kinangmon atik ibahon ino fam hindi wenggel haruk lahen?" ulug kapal hibagma
43009036	ap inowen te, "At ubam nindi wenggel hahuken Nowe sa fahet ehen?" ibagma Yesusen te,
43009037	"Haren yet hehenon hubam Ele urukon At ino tu," ulug ubam hiyag itfag.
43009038	Hiyag itfagma, "Nowe, nindimu we tem wenggel haruk lahi," ibareg Yesus alukema elenggen fam hur atfag.
43009039	Hur atfagma Yesusen ele uruk lit, "An kinangma waharikikon alem piren unubam umbuhuken waharikik. Inil hupnihon fenggenap enebuhuken waharikik. Inil fano yet harukon inil hubun enebuhuk ulug waharikik," ibag.
43009040	Yesusen ele ibahon ari Farisi inap tot welatfahon arimanowen hol hibareg Ubam enele uruk lit, "Hele ehenon ari nir oho ninil hupnihon welahema ehen?" ulug kapal hibagma
43009041	Yesusen it hiyag isaruk lit, "Hit hinil hupnig lalepma siyag ane turuk eleg hinap welalep. Welalep angge famen ninil fano yet hehe uruk lahepma mondabi siyag ane eneg turuk lamuhup," ulug hiyag isibag.
43010001	Yesusen ele hiyag isaruk lit, "Ap san wam domba elehet oko kilabeg ambeg lalug sok ele ke kuk fug anggeyen elehet fene lahalug kuruk halug at inowen ngi ahun ware feselug anggengge hilamin peruk ahun hag toho wereg. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
43010002	Ap san sok ele ke pikit kuruk halug at ino domba foroho ahun hag toho wereg.
43010003	At ino fahet sok ngi ahun inowen husurukmu ambohom domba arimanowen oho inikni ele holtuk. Ambohom wal taneg ununuk uruk lit wol toho wilip eneptuk.
43010004	Wol toho wilip eneptug at ino eneluke fil larukmu ambohom arimanowen ninikni ele holehe ulug ombolim laruk.
43010005	Enemu inap fahet domba arimanowen ninikni ele hag toho uruk eleg ulug ombolim la fug angge embeselug linggik-longgo uruk," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
43010006	Yesusen wam domba fam wirim haruk lit ibag ane indit toho hiyag isibagma it arimanowen At ibag ane aru fahet inindi anggar atfag fug.
43010007	Yesusen nin eke hiyag isaruk lit, "Wam domba elehet oko kilabeg ambeg sok wirihon ino An ninggareg fahet ihi. Ari tem toho hiyag hisaruk lahi.
43010008	An kinangma uwan wam fugmu tam watfag inap arimanowen ngi inap unusuruk lit enengge hilaruk inap watfagma wam domba arimano enele holuk fug teg latfag.
43010009	Sok wirihon ino An welahi. Ap sa An wereg keyen kuruk halug at ino fano wereg lit kuk wilip am turuk lit naruk angge fanowon hiyag tahu.
43010010	Yoholiyangge hilaruk inaben domba enebe kong toho unusuruk lit winon hirag tamin ulug waharuk. An waharikikon ino it onoluk fano wereg lit enengge fano-fano angge sebe roho foroho lamuhup ulug An waharikik.
43010011	Wam domba ngi ahun fanowon ino An welahi. Ngi ahun fanowon inowen nambohom fahet fano nuwabukag peruk.
43010012	Wam domba forohowon fahet onggo og utukon at amu ahun wereg lit ngi roho wereg elehen olomene olokon waharukmu akolen domba lin isalug laruk. Larukmu olomene olokon waharuk lit wam arimano senggel eneptuk lit yanggal eneptukmu linggik-longgo uruk.
43010013	Wam domba foroho ahun ino ambohom fahet fano wenggel ha fug angge onggo fahet eneg wenggeltukon ariyen domba lin isalug laruk.
43010014	Wam domba ngi ahun fanowon ino An welahi. An ninggarehen Nambohom domba kim isaruk lahimu iren oho An onoluk teg lit wereg.
43010015	Ari hag toho Nikniyen oho An niyarukmu Anden oho Nikni haruk lahi. Anden nambohom fahet fano Nuwabukag peruk lahi.
43010016	Wam domba elehet oko kilabeg ambeg aru welam fug tohon winon arimano oho Anden foroho lahi. Domba winon arimano oho Anden hondoko kilabik waruhukmu iren oho An nele holuhupmu domba arimano oho onori men mangno roho wereg lit inikni misig ambohom hag toho welamuhup.
43010017	Nikniyen nolukap nabuhuwen Anden fano Nuwabukag peruk lahiyon ariyen Nikniyen indi Nasug.
43010018	An nuwatuk ane ari aben peruk ane fug, Ninggarehen nuwabukag peruk lahi. An nuwariyek ulug Nebe unug isa reg lahi, nin Noluk am teg lahi. Anden uruk lahi ane aru yabuk Nikniyen hiyag Nitisiyon fahet uruk lahi," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
43010019	Ari ulug hiyag isibag ane fahet Yahudi inaben it-it suwahal uruk latfag.
43010020	Yahudi inap winon welatfahon arimanowen, "Ap aru Undama siyag angge wereg lit nenek turuk. Nungge fahet At ele holtuk lahep?" ulug uruk latfag.
43010021	It ap winon arimanowen, "Siyag angge undama wereg ahunen ari hag toho uk fug teg. Ap siyag angge undama werehonen ap il hupnihon fenggenuk teg?" ulug umung-umung atuk latfag.
43010022	Welatfagma sun li lahibagma Allah ibam sok husibag sali yoho welahe ulug Yahudi inaben seni esetuk latfag.
43010023	Yesus ino Allah ibam wirigmu libareg o pumbuk hili-hili angge wirigmu hili misig unuk Salomo ino laruk latfag.
43010024	Larukmen Yahudi inap At walinggoho waharuk latfareg Ubam enele uruk lit, "Hat Mesias ap obog toho fanowap enebik waruhu ibahon ino ano, amuwon ano, nit ninindi nonghong uruken nungge fahet nit nunumbahalug lahen? Mesias ino Hat welahen halug nit nunubam seleg toho hiyag nisimin," ibag.
43010025	Ari ibagma Yesusen te, "Anden hiyag hisaruk latikik angge famen hiren An nubam wenggel harikip fug. Nikniyen yabuk hiyag Nitisimu Anden wituk lahiyon ari ap inilmu eneg amag ulug turuk lahi.
43010026	Hit An nambohom hag toho welahep fuhon ariyen An nubam wenggel haruk lahep fug.
43010027	An nambohom Nele holtukmu Anden isaruk lahiyon arimano Nombolim waharuk.
43010028	It mondabi onoluk welamuhup ulug Anden og isaruk lahi, mondabi siyag am fug angge weregma ap misihen oho An ninggikmuwen taluk toho og enebuhu fug.
43010029	Nikniyen Hat hambohom ulug og Nitisiyon ino ap kinangmon men wirim teg eleg. Ap misihen oho Nikni inggikmu werehon arimano taluk enebuk fug teg.
43010030	An oho Nikni oho Nenebe we misig welahe," ulug Yesusen hiyag isibag.
43010031	Ari ulug hiyag isibagma Yahudi inap arimanowen helep wibareg Yesus wabul ulug turuk latfag.
43010032	Turuk latfagma Yesusen te, "Fano ane anggolo Nikniyen turuk latisiyon hiren yet hawag ulug unug hisaruk latikik. Anden siyag ane nungge unug hisarikikmu Nuwabul ulug turuk lahep?" ulug kapal isibag.
43010033	Kapal isibagma iren te, "Fano ane tirikinmu Huwabul ulug turuk lahe fug. Haren Allah abug uruk lit Hat ap kinangmon famen Allah men wirim taruk lahenma Huwabul ulug turuk lahe," ibag.
43010034	Ari ibagma Yesusen, "Suwesingga atam haharoho imbibahon hiren tohon ino fam, 'Hit welahebon Allah hag toho welahep ulug Anden hiyag hisaruk lahi,' ulug haharoho imbibag.
43010035	Ap atam welatfahon arimano unubam Allahn ele uruk lit hit Allah hag toho welahep ibag. Tam haharoho imbibahon ari elehap tuk fug teg.
43010036	Ari reg angge famen An Nikniyen mumal tarisireg kinangma monde ferisiyon ino famen hiren te, 'Allah abug uruk lahen,' uruk lahep. Fahe Anden te, 'An Allah amloho welahi,' ihiyon ari fahet uruk lahep?
43010037	Nikni iyabuk wituk lahi fug halug An nubam hinindi wenggel ha fug.
43010038	An Nikni iyabuk wituk lahi angge famen An nubam hinindi wenggel haruk lahep fugmu yabuk wituk lahi ane fahet hinindi wenggel haruk lamek. Hinindi wenggel haruk lamuhupteg An Nikni men welahi, Ar oho An men wereg ulug honoluk aruhumu hinindi anggar aruhu," ibag.
43010039	Ari ibagma nin eke senebul ulug turukmen ininggik kobog isalug wilip atfag.
43010040	Wilip atfareg Yohanesen atam ap ikma pilap eneptuk latfag ambeg Yordan fumag fil libareg welatfag.
43010041	Weregma ap anggolo At ambeg libareg it-it enele sahaltuk lit, "Yohanes inowen enehangge poholmonen turuk ane misig oho tirisi fug. Tirisi fug angge famen hun tu fahet irisiyon ino obog toho tem toho irisimu haruk lahe," ibag.
43010042	Ap anggolo o ino welatfahon arimanowen tem toho ehek ulug at ubam inindi wenggel haruk latfag.
43011001	O Betania Maria men Marta men inibam ino hun unuk Lazarus ouk waruk lit welatfag.
43011002	Maria inowen ahaluwe amben fanowon fam Yesus uyugmu hililfareg oruk fam puhun tibibag hiyap ino welatfag.
43011003	Lazarus ouk waruk latfahon ino it piren enerek welatfag. Welatfagma hiyap itanowen, "Nonowe, Haren hindi reg lahenon ino ouk waruk," ulug ap misig Yesus ambeg monde fibag.
43011004	Monde fibagma ap ino libareg ari ulug hiyag Itfagma hol hibareg Yesusen te, "Ouk ari famen war am fug teg, ouk ariyen Allah amloho tu ulug wel tuhuben Allah unuk palimu werehon ebenam aruhu," ibag.
43011005	Lazarus men ereki Marta men owe men Indi enesug lit welatfag angge famen
43011006	ouk waruk ulug hol hibareg At welatfag ambeg inggik pirenam welatfag.
43011007	Welatfareg Yesusen otsi unubam, "Nori, Yudea suhuloho lul," ibag.
43011008	Ari ibagma Otsi arimanowen Onowe fam enele uruk lit, "Yahudi inaben ketiya helep fam Huwabul ulug turusa angge famen nin eke lul uruk lahen?" ibag.
43011009	Ari ibagma Yesusen te, "O misihim sambil eneg mo lahik watug nin ubuk uruk eleg? Ap san o sakan tegma laruk halug il seleg tehen ambilan wabuk fug teg.
43011010	Ap san o hik tegma laruk halug ilmu seleg teg elehen ap ino ambilan wabuk teg," ibag.
43011011	Ari ulug hiyag isibareg, "Nenere Lazarus ino nohoruk lit werehen elel haminen lul," ibag.
43011012	Ari ibagma Otsiyen, "Nonowe, at ino nohoruk halug fobik fano aruhu," ibag.
43011013	Ibag ane ari Yesusen indimu war aha ulug ibag angge famen Otsiyen te we tem toho nohorukon fahet ehek pibareg ari ibag.
43011014	Ari ibagma Yesus inowen fag toho Otsi hiyag isaruk lit, "Lazarus war ahayon Noluk ahama ihi.
43011015	Hit An nubahet hinindi anggar aruhuwen An elegma at ino fano war aha. War ahama ketiya nit enembeg lulen maniyek," ibag.
43011016	Ari ibagma Tomas unuk eke Namiya Malik suwalfahon inowen ori unubam, "Nir oho At men ambiyeg lulteg war amulen lul," ibag.
43011017	Lazarus war atfagma owikmu kilapfag sali ino hup uhanam atfagma o Betania libag.
43011018	O Betania ino Yerusalem horogma (tiga kilometer) welatfag.
43011019	O ino Yahudi inap anggolo Maria men Marta men enerek war atfagma inindi yuwag toho welamul ulug enembeg watfareg welatfag.
43011020	Welatfagma Martan Yesus kema waharuk urukon hol hibareg Maria olma weregma embeselug Yesus kema hondohik libag.
43011021	Hondohik libareg Yesus fam ele uruk lit, "Nowe, Hat tuma wereg lalenma hahen nenerek war alep fug.
43011022	War atisi angge famen Haren ketiya oho Allah fam nungge nungge heng timihinmu Aren og Hitmisiyon an noluk," ibag.
43011023	Ibagma Yesusen Marta fam, "Herek oluk atmisi," ibag.
43011024	Ibagma Martan, "Ap war atukon arimano Allahn ap onolukap enebuhu sambil ino ar oho oluk aruhuwon an noluk," ibag.
43011025	Ibagma Yesusen te, "Warehon onolukap eneptukon men yinggigmu unduhuk feserukon men An welahi. Ap san An nubam wenggel niyaruk halug at ino war aruhu angge famen nin oluk aruhu.
43011026	Ap sa onoluk werehonen An nubam wenggel Niyaruk halug at ino war am fug angge mondabi oluk welaruhu. Ihiyon aru fahet tem toho peruk lahen?" ulug kapal hibag.
43011027	Kapal hibagma Marta inowen, "Nowe, Mesias Allah amloho kinangma wambik waruhu ibahon ino Hat welahen ulug tem toho peruk lahi," ibag.
43011028	Yesus fam ari ibareg Marta ino Maria ambeg libareg isanggo kilabeg hiyag utuk lit, "Nonoweyen hat watmisi ulug wol haptuk," ibag.
43011029	Hiyag itfagma holfareg in atug folo-folo Yesus ambeg libag.
43011030	Yesus o pumbukmu uwan kuk fug angge Marta min enele ibag ambeg itano weregma libag.
43011031	Yahudi inap inindi yuwag toho welamul ulug enembeg watfahon arimanowen Maria in atlug folo-folo wilip atukmu yet hibareg owikmu uba yatmisiyen laruk ulug ombolim mutug libag.
43011032	Maria Yesus ambeg libareg At yet hibareg Uyug alma hur atfareg, "Nowe, Hat tuma wereg lalenma hahen nenerek ino war alep fug," ibag.
43011033	Ari ibagma Yesusen yer isarukmen Maria men Yahudi inap watfahon arimano men uba yatukmu yer isibareg Undaman olok hibag angge famen Indi anggin atfareg,
43011034	"Ebe wareg angge kema imbik larikip," ulug kapal isibag. Kapal isibagma it arimanowen, "Nonowe, Hat yet hamihinen ma," ibag.
43011035	Iren ari ibagma Yesus oho uba yatfag.
43011036	Uba yatukmu Yahudi inaben yet hibareg, "Aren oho Indi haruk lit wereg," uruk latfag.
43011037	Ari uruk latfagma ap it sehelimu welatfahon arimanowen, "Il hupnihon fenggenap tuk teg latisi angge famen ap tu uwan war am fugmu hihibuk fug teg latisi ano?" ulug umung-umung atuk latfag.
43011038	Ari ulug umung-umung atuk latfagma Yesus nin eke Undaman olok hibareg kilapfag ambeg ino libag. Kilapfag ambeg ari owik elma kila fibareg helep fam sok laroho kila fisibag.
43011039	Libareg Yesusen, "Helep ari miyaloho imbisik lalihip," ibag. Yesusen ari ibagma Lazarus erek Marta inowen te, "Nowe, war atisi sali yoho uhaneg welahe angge re amben tirisi lit teg," ibag.
43011040	Ibagma Yesusen te, "We tem toho ari peruk lahen halug Allah lehoma werehonen timisi ane yet hamihin ulug fahe hiyag hirihi fug?" ibagma
43011041	helep ino miyaloho ilanma imbik libag. Imbik libagma Yesusen il poholma lahap haruk lit, "Anden Hubam heng tihiyon Nele holehenma Nikni uruk lahi.
43011042	Haren likiya hupmu An nele holtuk lahenon An noluk. Ap An walinggoho werehon aruman Haren An mon Naptikinon fahet tem toho pelusan Nele Hubam uruk lahi," ibag.
43011043	Ari ibareg Ele ine roho uruk lit, "Lazarus, in atug wilibig ma," ibag.
43011044	Ari ibagma ap warehon ino sum fam inggik uyug pug teg angge orohole oho sum yanggowon fam hililip teg angge wilip atfag. Wilip atfagma Yesusen it unubam te, "Hele inggik pug tehon lole feselihipmu lamisi," ibag.
43011045	Yahudi inap anggolo Maria ambeg watfahon arimano winonen Yesusen tibag ane ari yet hibareg Ubam inindi wenggel haruk latfag.
43011046	It winonen Farisi inap enembeg libareg Yesusen tibag ane fahet hiyag isa libag.
43011047	Hiyag isibagma imam onowesi suwon men Farisi inap menen ap suwon obog toho wol eneptuk lit palu enepfareg enele sahaltuk lit, "Ap ariyen poholman turuk ane fano ane eneg turuken nangginoho tuhuk?
43011048	Niren At senetuk ane umbusuhuk halug ap obog toho Ubam wenggel haruk lamuhupmu Roma inap waharuk lit nit ninibamen yanggal neneptuk lit nenebe nunusuhup tohon," ulug sahaltuk latfag.
43011049	Enele sahaltuk lit weregma hun Kayafas mo ino fam imam onowe suwon lahapfahon ino it sehelimu in atfareg it unubam ele uruk lit, "Hit hinindimu henepeleg teg lit wenggel ha fug toho welahep.
43011050	Ap obog toho fahet ap misig war atuk halug ari fano, nit ap obog toho nunusuhup ari siyag ulug wenggel haruk lamek," ibag.
43011051	Ibag ane ari inggareg indi amuwen wenggel hibareg ibag fug, mo ino famen at imam onowe suwon unduhuk fibagma Allahn Yesus ap obog toho fahet war aruhu pibag ane hikit toho Kayafas inowen hiyag isibag.
43011052	Allahn pibag ane ari o pumbuk ino fahet eneg war aruhu pibag fug, Allah umalikisi linggik-longgo urusareg werehon arimano andog enebuhureg mangnowap enebuhu pibag.
43011053	Enele sahaltuk latfag sambil ino famen At ino wabuhuk ulug kong tibag.
43011054	Wabuhuk ulug kong tibagma Yahudi inap onorohole ke la fug angge Yesus otsi men o pumbuk misig unuk Efraim fare horog toho libareg welatfag.
43011055	Yahudi inap suburu roti sig elehon naruk sul Paskah horog atfagma ap anggolo o pumbuk obog toho arimano nenebe ik umag nenebukag ulug o Yerusalem libag.
43011056	Libareg Allah ibamen unduhuk lit, "Hit nungge peruk lahep? At ino Paskah narukmu watmisi ano?" ulug it-it enele sahaltuk lit Yesus yami ruruk latfag.
43011057	Atam imam onowesi suwon men Farisi inap menen ap fam enele yonggo emberuk lit, "Ap san Yesus wereg ambeg onoluk atuk halug nit hiyag nisa wamuhupmu niren senebuhuk," ulug ap unubam enele yonggo imbibag.
43012001	Suburu roti sig elehon naruk sul Paskah ino o falfalik nahuk ulug uwanma Yesus o Betania Lazarus war atfagma olukap tibag ambeg ino libag.
43012002	O inowen Yesus fahet seni esetfareg Lazarus men it heriyeg lit weregma Marta suburu isag isaruk lit ler eneptuk latfag.
43012003	Weregma Maria inowen ahaluwe amben fanowon kubag misig onggo anggolo reg angge famen walug watfareg Yesus uyugmu are ribareg oruk fam puhun turuk latfag. Ari turukmu o ino fam ahaluwe amben eneg turuk latfag.
43012004	Ari turuk latfagma Yesus otsi itano misig Yudas Iskariot At wabukag ulug huruwe lahuk pibag ahun inowen ele uruk lit,
43012005	"Ahaluwe amben fanowon ari ayeg waroho uang inggila teng-teng angge helelepteg uang ari ap enengge elehon og isawon famen nungge fahet tehek," ibag.
43012006	Ibag ane ari ap enengge elehon nindi ulug wenggel haruk eleg anggeyen ap enengge yoholiyangge waruk ahun wereg liren ibag. At ino uang emberuk angge seneg lit winon hirag taruk latfag.
43012007	Yudas inowen ari ibagma Yesusen te, "Aren tehek ane ari An helep elma kilap Nabuhupmu tuhu hag toho tehekma imbisiyek.
43012008	Ap enengge elehon likiya hupmu hit honolohotma welamuhup angge famen An mondabi hit min welaruhuk fug," ibag.
43012009	O pumbuk ino fam Yesus wereg urukon hol hibareg Yahudi inap anggolo roho watfag. Watfahon arimano Yesus fahet eneg pen hul ulug watfag fug. Hun Lazarus Yesusen olukap tibahon ino oho kim hul ulug watfag.
43012010	Watfagma imam onowesi itanowen, "Ap anggolo nit nenele holuk fug angge Yesusen Lazarus olukap tirisi ulug At ubam eneg wenggel haruken Lazarus oho ware fesuhuk," ulug enele sahaltuk latfag.
43012012	Likiyamon ap anggolo Paskah nahuk ulug watfahon arimanowen Yesus o Yerusalem horogma waharuk urukmu hol hibareg
